[03] thero kira pupphacchaḍḍakakulato nikkhamma pabbajito, khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ patvā cintesi -- ``ahaṃ ajjeva pabbajito ajjeva me pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ, catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmamaṇḍitaṃ mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ pūressāmī''ti. so paṃsukūlatthāya sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā coḷakaṃ pariyesanto vicari. atheko mahābrahmā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya manussapathaṃ olokento theraṃ disvā -- ``ajjeva pabbajitvā ajjeva khuragge arahattaṃ patvā mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ pūretuṃ coḷakaṃ pariyesatī''ti añjaliṃ paggayha namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. tamañño mahābrahmā disvā ``kaṃ namassasī''ti? pucchi. nītattheraṃ namassāmīti. kiṃ kāraṇāti? ajjeva pabbajitvā ajjeva khuragge arahattaṃ patvā mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ pūretuṃ coḷakaṃ pariyesatīti. sopi naṃ namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. athañño, athaññoti sattasatā mahābrahmāno namassamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``tā devatā sattasatā uḷārā,
[27] brahmā vimānā abhinikkhamitvā.
[26] nītaṃ namassanti pasannacittā,
[22] `khīṇāsavo gaṇhati paṃsukūlaṃ'''..
[21] ``tā ^a^M2.0274^ea^ devatā sattasatā uḷārā,
[27] brahmā vimānā abhinikkhamitvā.
[26] nītaṃ namassanti pasannacittā,
[22] `khīṇāsavo kayirati paṃsukūlaṃ'''..
[21] ```khīṇāsavo ^a^V2.0264^ea^ dhovati paṃsukūlaṃ'.
[27] `khīṇāsavo rajati paṃsukūlaṃ'.
[22] `khīṇāsavo pārupati paṃsakūla'''nti..
[03] iti bhagavā imasmiṃ sutte desanaṃ tīhi bhavehi vinivattetvā arahattassa kūṭaṃ gaṇhi. desanāpariyosāne pañcasatā bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu. sattamaṃ.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^kismiñcideva pakaraṇe^eb^ti kismiñcideva kāraṇe. ^b^paṇāmetvā^eb^ti nīharitvā. kismiṃ pana kāraṇe ete bhagavatā paṇāmitāti? ekasmiñhi ^a^P2.0298^ea^ antovasse bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ vasitvā vutthavasso pavāretvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro sāvatthito nikkhamitvā janapadacārikaṃ caranto kapilavatthuṃ patvā nigrodhārāmaṃ pāvisi. sakyarājāno ``satthā āgato''ti sutvā pacchābhatte kappiyāni telamadhuphāṇitādīni ceva pānakāni ca kājasatehi gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā saṅghassa niyyātetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ karontā ekamante nisīdiṃsu. satthā tesaṃ madhuradhammakathaṃ kathento nisīdi. tasmiṃ khaṇe ekacce bhikkhū senāsanaṃ paṭijagganti, ekacce mañcapīṭhādīni paññāpenti, sāmaṇerā appaharitaṃ karonti. bhājanīyaṭṭhāne sampattabhikkhūpi atthi, asampattabhikkhūpi atthi. sampattā asampattānaṃ lābhaṃ gaṇhantā, ``amhākaṃ detha, amhākaṃ ācariyassa detha upajjhāyassa dethā''ti kathentā mahāsaddamakaṃsu. satthā sutvā theraṃ pucchi ``ke pana te, ānanda, uccāsaddā mahāsaddā kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope''ti? thero etamatthaṃ ārocesi. satthā sutvā ``āmisahetu, ānanda, bhikkhū mahāsaddaṃ karontī''ti āha. ``āma, bhante''ti. ``ananucchavikaṃ, ānanda, appatirūpaṃ. na ^a^M2.0275^ea^ hi mayā kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni cīvarādihetu pāramiyo pūritā, nāpi ime bhikkhū cīvarādihetu agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā, arahattahetu pabbajitvā anatthaṃ atthasadisaṃ asāraṃ sārasadisaṃ karonti, gacchānanda, te bhikkhū paṇāmehī''ti.

[03] ^b^pubbaṇhasamaya^eb^nti dutiyadivase pubbaṇhasamayaṃ. ^b^beluvalaṭṭhikāya mūle^eb^ti taruṇabeluvarukkhamūle. ^b^pabāḷho^eb^ti pabāhito. pavāḷhotipi pāṭho, pavāhitoti attho. ubhayampi nīhaṭabhāvameva ^a^V2.0265^ea^ dīpeti. ^b^siyā aññathatta^eb^nti pasādaññathattaṃ vā bhāvaññathattaṃ vā bhaveyya. kathaṃ? ``sammāsambuddhena mayaṃ lahuke kāraṇe paṇāmitā''ti ^a^P2.0299^ea^ pasādaṃ mandaṃ karontānaṃ pasādaññathattaṃ nāma hoti. saliṅgeneva titthāyatanaṃ pakkamantānaṃ bhāvaññathattaṃ nāma. ^b^siyā vipariṇāmo^eb^ti ettha pana ``mayaṃ satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇhituṃ sakkhissāmāti pabbajitā, naṃ gahetuṃ asakkontānaṃ kiṃ amhākaṃ pabbajjāyā''ti? sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattanaṃ vipariṇāmoti veditabbo. ^b^vacchassā^eb^ti khīrūpakavacchassa. ^b^aññathatta^eb^nti milāyanāññathattaṃ. khīrūpako hi vaccho mātu adassanena khīraṃ alabhanto milāyati kampati pavedhati. ^b^vipariṇāmo^eb^ti maraṇaṃ. so hi khīraṃ alabhamāno khīrapipāsāya sussanto patitvā marati.

[03] ^b^bījānaṃ taruṇāna^eb^nti udakena anuggahetabbānaṃ virūḷhabījānaṃ. ^b^aññathatta^eb^nti milāyanaññathattameva. tāni hi udakaṃ alabhantāni milāyanti. ^b^vipariṇāmo^eb^ti vināso. tāni hi udakaṃ alabhantāni sukkhitvā vinassanti, palālameva honti. ^b^anuggahito^eb^ti āmisānuggahena ceva dhammānuggahena ca anuggahito. ^b^anuggaṇheyya^eb^nti dvīhipi etehi anuggahehi anuggaṇheyyaṃ. acirapabbajitā hi sāmaṇerā ceva daharabhikkhū ca cīvarādipaccayavekalle vā sati gelaññe vā satthārā vā ācariyupajjhāyehi vā āmisānuggahena ananuggahitā kilamantā na sakkonti sajjhāyaṃ vā manasikāraṃ vā kātuṃ, dhammānuggahena ananuggahitā uddesena ceva ovādānusāsaniyā ca parihāyamānā na sakkonti akusalaṃ parivajjetvā kusalaṃ bhāvetuṃ. imehi pana dvīhi anuggahehi anuggahitā kāyena akilamantā sajjhāyamanasikāre pavattitvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamānā ^a^M2.0276^ea^ aparabhāge taṃ anuggahaṃ alabhantāpi teneva purimānuggahena laddhabalā sāsane patiṭṭhahanti, tasmā bhagavato evaṃ parivitakko udapādi.

[03] ^b^bhagavato purato pāturahosī^eb^ti satthu cittaṃ ñatvā -- ``ime bhikkhū bhagavatā paṇāmitā, idāni nesaṃ anuggahaṃ kātukāmo evaṃ cintesi, kāraṇaṃ bhagavā cintesi, ahamettha ussāhaṃ janessāmī''ti purato pākaṭo ahosi. ^b^santettha bhikkhū^eb^ti idaṃ so mahābrahmā yathā nāma byatto sūdo yadeva ^a^P2.0300^ea^ ambilaggādīsu rasajātaṃ rañño ruccati, taṃ abhisaṅkhārena sādutaraṃ katvā punadivase upanāmeti, evameva attano byattatāya bhagavatā āhaṭaupamaṃyeva ^b^evametaṃ bhagavā^eb^tiādivacanehi abhisaṅkharitvā bhagavantaṃ yācanto bhikkhusaṅghassa anuggahakaraṇatthaṃ vadati ^a^V2.0266^ea^. tattha ^b^abhinandatū^eb^ti ``mama santikaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho āgacchatū''ti. evamassa āgamanaṃ sampiyāyamāno abhinandatu. ^b^abhivadatū^eb^ti āgatassa ca ovādānusāsaniṃ dadanto abhivadatu.

[03] ^b^paṭisallānā^eb^ti ekībhāvā. ^b^iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsī^eb^ti iddhiṃ akāsi. ^b^ekadvīhikāyā^eb^ti ekeko ceva dve dve ca hutvā. ^b^sārajjamānarūpā^eb^ti ottappamānasabhāvā bhāyamānā. kasmā pana bhagavā tesaṃ tathā upasaṅkamanāya iddhimakāsīti? hitapatthanāya. yadi hi te vaggavaggā hutvā āgaccheyyuṃ, ``bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇāmetvā araññaṃ paviṭṭho ekadivasampi tattha vasituṃ nāsakkhi, vegeneva āgato''ti keḷimpi kareyyuṃ. atha nesaṃ neva buddhagāravaṃ paccupaṭṭhaheyya, na dhammadesanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ samatthā bhaveyyuṃ. sabhayānaṃ pana sasārajjānaṃ ekadvīhikāya āgacchantānaṃ buddhagāravañceva paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati, dhammadesanañca sampaṭicchituṃ sakkhissantīti cintetvā tesaṃ hitapatthanāya tathārūpaṃ iddhiṃ akāsi.

[03] ^b^nisīdiṃsū^eb^ti tesu hi sārajjamānarūpesu āgacchantesu eko bhikkhu ``mamaṃyeva satthā oloketi, maṃyeva maññe niggaṇhitukāmo''ti saṇikaṃ āgantvā vanditvā nisīdi, athañño athaññoti evaṃ pañcabhikkhusatāni nisīdiṃsu. evaṃ nisinnaṃ pana bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sīdantare sannisinnaṃ mahāsamuddaṃ ^a^P2.0301^ea^ viya nivāte padīpaṃ viya ca niccalaṃ disvā satthā cintesi -- ``imesaṃ ^a^M2.0277^ea^ bhikkhūnaṃ kīdisī dhammadesanā vaṭṭatī''ti? athassa etadahosi -- ``ime āhārahetu paṇāmitā, piṇḍiyālopadhammadesanāva nesaṃ sappāyā, taṃ dassetvā matthake tiparivaṭṭadesanaṃ desessāmi, desanāpariyosāne sabbe arahattaṃ pāpuṇissantī''ti. atha nesaṃ taṃ dhammadesanaṃ desento ^b^antamidaṃ, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^anta^eb^nti pacchimaṃ lāmakaṃ. ^b^yadidaṃ piṇḍolya^eb^nti yaṃ evaṃ piṇḍapariyesanena jīvikaṃ kappentassa jīvitaṃ. ayaṃ panettha padattho -- piṇḍāya ulatīti piṇḍolo, piṇḍolassa kammaṃ ^b^piṇḍolyaṃ,^eb^ piṇḍapariyesanena nipphāditajīvitanti attho. ^b^abhisāpo^eb^ti akkoso. kupitā hi manussā attano paccatthikaṃ ``cīvaraṃ nivāsetvā kapālaṃ gahetvā piṇḍaṃ pariyesamāno carissatī''ti akkosanti. atha vā pana ``kiṃ tuyhaṃ akātabbaṃ atthi, yo tvaṃ evaṃ balavā vīriyasampannopi hirottappaṃ pahāya kapaṇo viya piṇḍolo vicarasi pattapāṇī''ti? evampi ^a^V2.0267^ea^ akkosantiyeva. ^b^tañca kho eta^eb^nti evaṃ taṃ abhisāpaṃ samānampi piṇḍolyaṃ. ^b^kulaputtā upenti atthavasikā^eb^ti mama sāsane jātikulaputtā ca ācārakulaputtā ca atthavasikā kāraṇavasikā hutvā kāraṇavasaṃ paṭicca upenti.

[03] ^b^rājābhinītā^eb^tiādīsu ye rañño santakaṃ khāditvā raññā bandhanāgāre bandhāpitā palāyitvā pabbajanti, te rājābhinītā nāma. te hi raññā bandhanaṃ abhinītattā ^b^rājābhinītā^eb^ nāma. ye pana corehi aṭaviyaṃ gahetvā ekaccesu māriyamānesu ekacce ``mayaṃ sāmi tumhehi vissaṭṭhā gehaṃ anajjhāvasitvā pabbajissāma, tattha yaṃ yaṃ buddhapūjādipuññaṃ karissāma, tato tumhākaṃ pattiṃ dassāmā''ti tehi vissaṭṭhā pabbajanti, te ^b^corābhinītā^eb^ nāma. tepi hi corehi māretabbataṃ abhinītāti corābhinītā nāma. ye pana iṇaṃ gahetvā paṭidātuṃ asakkontā palāyitvā pabbajanti, te ^b^iṇaṭṭā^eb^ nāma, iṇapīḷitāti attho ^a^P2.0302^ea^. iṇaṭṭhātipi pāṭho, iṇe ṭhitāti attho. ye rājacorachātakarogabhayānaṃ aññatarena abhibhūtā upaddutā pabbajanti, te ^b^bhayaṭṭā^eb^ nāma, bhayapīḷitāti attho. bhayaṭṭhātipi pāṭho, bhaye ^a^M2.0278^ea^ ṭhitāti attho. ^b^ājīvikāpakatā^eb^ti ājīvikāya upaddutā abhibhūtā, puttadāraṃ posetuṃ asakkontāti attho. ^b^otiṇṇāmhā^eb^ti anto anupaviṭṭhā.

[03] ^b^so ca hoti abhijjhālū^eb^ti idaṃ so kulaputto ``dukkhassa antaṃ karissāmī''tiādivasena cittaṃ uppādetvā pabbajito, aparabhāge, taṃ pabbajjaṃ tathārūpaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, taṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^abhijjhālū^eb^ti parabhaṇḍānaṃ abhijjhāyitā. ^b^tibbasārāgo^eb^ti bahalarāgo. ^b^byāpannacitto^eb^ti pūtibhāvena vipannacitto. ^b^paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo^eb^ti tikhiṇasiṅgo viya goṇo duṭṭhacitto. ^b^muṭṭhassatī^eb^ti bhattanikkhittakāko viya naṭṭhassati, idha kataṃ ettha nassati. ^b^asampajāno^eb^ti nippañño. khandhādiparicchedarahito. ^b^asamāhito^eb^ti caṇḍasote baddhanāvā viya upacārappanābhāvena asaṇṭhito. ^b^vibbhantacitto^eb^ti bandhāruḷhamago viya santamano. ^b^pākatindriyo^eb^ti yathā gihī puttadhītaro olokento asaṃvutindriyo hoti, evaṃ asaṃvutindriyo.

[03] ^b^chavālāta^eb^nti chavānaṃ daḍḍhaṭṭhāne alātaṃ. ^b^ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagata^eb^nti pamāṇena aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu ādittaṃ majjhe gūthamakkhitaṃ. ^b^neva gāme^eb^ti ^a^P2.0303^ea^ sace hi taṃ yuganaṅgalagopānasipakkhapāsakādīnaṃ ^a^V2.0268^ea^ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā assa, gāme kaṭṭhatthaṃ phareyya. sace khettakuṭiyaṃ kaṭṭhattharamañcakādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā, araññe kaṭṭhatthaṃ phareyya. yasmā pana ubhayathāpi na sakkā, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^gihibhogā ca parihīno^eb^ti yo agāre vasantehi gihīhi dāyajje bhājiyamāne bhogo laddhabbo assa, tato ca parihīno. ^b^sāmaññatthañcā^eb^ti ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā pariyattipaṭivedhavasena pattabbaṃ sāmaññatthañca. imañca pana upamaṃ satthā na dussīlassa vasena āhari, parisuddhasīlassa pana alasassa abhijjhādīhi dosehi upahatassa puggalassa imaṃ upamaṃ āhari.

[03] ^b^tayome, bhikkhave^eb^ti kasmā āraddhaṃ? imassa puggalassa chavālātasadisabhāvo neva mātāpitūhi kato, na ācariyupajjhāyehi, imehi pana pāpavitakkehi katoti dassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ. ^b^animittaṃ vā samādhi^eb^nti ^a^M2.0279^ea^ vipassanāsamādhiṃ. so hi niccanimittādīnaṃ samugghātanena animittoti vuccati. ettha ca cattāro satipaṭṭhānā missakā, animittasamādhi pubbabhāgo. animittasamādhi vā missako, satipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāgāti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^dvemā, bhikkhave, diṭṭhiyo^eb^ti idaṃ pana na kevalaṃ animittasamādhibhāvanā imesaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ mahāvitakkānaṃ pahānāya saṃvattati, sassatucchedadiṭṭhīnampi pana samugghātaṃ karotīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^na vajjavā assa^eb^nti niddoso bhaveyyaṃ. sesamettha uttānameva. iti bhagavā imasmimpi sutte desanaṃ tīhi bhavehi vinivattetvā arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhi. desanāvasāne pañcasatā bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^P2.0304^ea^ ^b^cārikaṃ pakkāmī^eb^ti kosambikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kalahakāle satthā ekadivasaṃ dīghītissa kosalarañño vatthuṃ āharitvā ``na hi verena verāni, sammantīdha kudācana''ntiādīhi (dha0 pa0 5) gāthāhi ovadati. taṃdivasaṃ tesaṃ kalahaṃ karontānaṃyeva ratti vibhātā. dutiyadivasepi bhagavā tameva vatthuṃ kathesi. taṃdivasampi tesaṃ kalahaṃ karontānaṃyeva ratti vibhātā. tatiyadivasepi bhagavā tameva vatthuṃ kathesi. atha naṃ aññataro bhikkhu evamāha -- ``appossukko, bhante, bhagavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ anuyutto viharatu, mayametena bhaṇḍanena ^a^V2.0269^ea^ kalahena viggahena vivādena paññāyissāmā''ti. satthā ``pariyādiṇṇarūpacittā kho ime moghapurisā, na ime sakkā saññāpetu''nti cintetvā -- ``kiṃ mayhaṃ imehi, ekacāravāsaṃ vasissāmī''ti? so pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā kosambiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kañcipi anāmantetvā ekova adutiyo cārikaṃ pakkāmi.

[03] ^b^yasmiṃ, āvuso, samaye^eb^ti idaṃ thero yasmāssa ajja bhagavā ekena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ pakkamissati, ajja dvīhi, ajja satena, ajja sahassena, ajja ekakovāti sabbo bhagavato cāro vidito pākaṭo paccakkho, tasmā āha.

[03] ^b^anupubbenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0280^ea^ gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā piṇḍāya caramāno ekacāravāsaṃ tāva vasamānaṃ bhikkhuṃ passitukāmo hutvā bālakaloṇakāragāmaṃ agamāsi. tattha bhaguttherassa sakalapacchābhattañceva tiyāmarattiñca ekacāravāse ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā punadivase tena pacchāsamaṇena piṇḍāya caritvā taṃ tattheva nivattetvā ``samaggavāsaṃ vasamāne tayo kulaputte passissāmī''ti pācīnavaṃsamigadāyaṃ agamāsi. tesampi sakalapacchābhattañceva tiyāmarattiñca ekacāravāse ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā te tattheva nivattetvā ekakova pālileyya nagarābhimukho pakkamitvā anupubbena pālileyyanagaraṃ sampatto. tena vuttaṃ -- ``anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena pālileyyakaṃ, tadavasarī''ti.

[03] ^b^bhaddasālamūle^eb^ti pālileyyavāsino bhagavato dānaṃ datvā ^a^P2.0305^ea^ pālileyyato avidūre rakkhitavanasaṇḍo nāma atthi, tattha bhagavato paṇṇasālaṃ katvā ``ettha vasathā''ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā vāsayiṃsu. bhaddasālo pana tattheko manāpo laddhako sālarukkho. bhagavā taṃ nagaraṃ upanissāya tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe paṇṇasālasamīpe tasmiṃ rukkhamūle viharati. tena vuttaṃ ``bhaddasālamūle''ti.

[03] evaṃ viharante panettha tathāgate aññataro hatthināgo hatthinīhi hatthipotakādīhi gocarabhūmititthogāhanādīsu ubbāḷho yūthe ukkaṇṭhito ``kiṃ me imehi hatthīhī''ti? yūthaṃ pahāya manussapathaṃ gacchanto pālileyyakavanasaṇḍe bhagavantaṃ disvā ghaṭasahassena nibbāpitasantāpo viya nibbuto hutvā satthu santike aṭṭhāsi. so tato paṭṭhāya satthu vattapaṭivattaṃ karonto mukhadhovanaṃ ^a^V2.0270^ea^ deti, nhānodakaṃ āharati, dantakaṭṭhaṃ deti, pariveṇaṃ sammajjati, araññato madhurāni phalāphalāni āharitvā satthuno deti. satthā paribhogaṃ karoti.

[03] ekadivasaṃ satthā rattibhāgasamanantare caṅkamitvā pāsāṇaphalake nisīdi. hatthīpi avidūre ṭhāne aṭṭhāsi. satthā pacchato oloketvā na kiñci addasa, evaṃ purato ca ubhayapassesu ca. athassa ``sukhaṃ vatāhaṃ aññatra tehi bhaṇḍanakārakehi vasāmī''ti cittaṃ uppajji. hatthinopi ``mayā nāmitasākhaṃ aññe khādantā natthī''tiādīni cintetvā -- ``sukhaṃ vata ekakova ^a^M2.0281^ea^ vasāmi, satthu vattaṃ kātuṃ labhāmī''ti cittaṃ uppajji. satthā attano cittaṃ oloketvā -- ``mama tāva īdisaṃ cittaṃ, kīdisaṃ nu kho hatthissā''ti tassāpi tādisameva disvā ``sameti no citta''nti imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi --
[21] ``etaṃ nāgassa nāgena, īsādantassa hatthino.
[22] sameti cittaṃ cittena, yadeko ramatī vane''ti.. (mahāva0 467).

[03] ^b^atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū^eb^ti atha evaṃ tathāgate tattha viharante pañcasatā disāsu vassaṃvutthā bhikkhū. ^b^yenāyasmā ānando^eb^ti ``satthā kira bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇāmetvā araññaṃ paviṭṭho''ti attano dhammatāya satthu santikaṃ gantuṃ asakkontā yenāyasmā ānando, tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.

[03] ^b^anantarā^eb^ ^a^P2.0306^ea^ ^b^āsavānaṃ khayo^eb^ti maggānantaraṃ arahattaphalaṃ. ^b^vicayaso^eb^ti vicayena, tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvavicinanasamatthena ñāṇena paricchinditvāti attho. ^b^dhammo^eb^ti sāsanadhammo. cattāro satipaṭṭhānātiādi ye ye koṭṭhāse paricchinditvā dhammo desito, tesaṃ pakāsanatthāya vuttaṃ. ^b^samanupassanā^eb^ti diṭṭhisamanupassanā. ^b^saṅkhāro so^eb^ti diṭṭhisaṅkhāro so. ^b^tatojo so saṅkhāro^eb^ti tato taṇhāto so saṅkhāro jāto. taṇhāsampayuttesu cittesupi catūsu cittesu esa jāyati. ^b^sāpi taṇhā^eb^ti sā diṭṭhisaṅkhārassa paccayabhūtā taṇhā. ^b^sāpi vedanā^eb^ti sā taṇhāya paccayabhūtā vedanā. ^b^sopi phasso^eb^ti so vedanāya paccayo avijjāsamphasso. ^b^sāpi avijjā^eb^ti sā phassasampayuttā avijjā.

[03] ^b^no cassaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0271^ea^, ^b^no ca me siyā^eb^ti sace ahaṃ na bhaveyyaṃ, mama parikkhāropi na bhaveyya. ^b^nābhavissaṃ, na me bhavissatī^eb^ti sace pana āyatimpi ahaṃ na bhavissāmi, evaṃ mama parikkhāropi na bhavissati. ettake ṭhāne bhagavā tena bhikkhunā gahitagahitadiṭṭhiṃ vissajjāpento āgato puggalajjhāsayenapi desanāvilāsenapi. ^b^tatojo so saṅkhāro^eb^ti taṇhāsampayuttacitte vicikicchāva natthi, kathaṃ vicikicchāsaṅkhāro taṇhāto jāyatīti? appahīnattā. yassa hi taṇhāya appahīnāya so ^a^M2.0282^ea^ uppajjati, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. diṭṭhiyāpi eseva nayo labbhatiyeva catūsu hi cittuppādesu sampayuttadiṭṭhi nāma natthi. yasmā pana taṇhāya appahīnattā sā uppajjati, tasmā taṃ sandhāya tatrāpi ayamattho yujjati. iti imasmiṃ sutte tevīsatiyā ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pāpetvā vipassanā kathitā. navamaṃ.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^tadahuposathe^eb^tiādi pavāraṇasutte vitthāritameva. ^b^kiñcideva desa^eb^nti kiñci kāraṇaṃ. ^b^sake āsane nisīditvā puccha yadākaṅkhasī^eb^ti kasmā evamāha? so kira bhikkhu pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro. ācariye ^a^P2.0307^ea^ pana ṭhitake pucchante sace te bhikkhū nisīdanti, satthari gāravaṃ kataṃ hoti, ācariye agāravaṃ. sace uṭṭhahanti, ācariye gāravaṃ kataṃ hoti, satthari agāravaṃ. iti nesaṃ cittaṃ anekaggaṃ bhavissati, desanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ na sakkhissanti. tasmiṃ pana nisīditvā pucchante tesaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ bhavissati, desanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ sakkhissantīti ñatvā bhagavā evamāha. ^b^ime nu kho, bhante^eb^ti ayaṃ thero pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ ācariyo, pañcakkhandhamattampi nappajānātīti na vattabbo. pañhaṃ pucchantena pana ``ime pañcupādānakkhandhā, na aññe''ti evaṃ jānantena viya hutvā pucchituṃ na vaṭṭati, tasmā ajānanto viya pucchati. tepi cassa antevāsikā ``amhākaṃ ācariyo `ahaṃ jānāmī'ti na katheti, sabbaññutaññāṇena pana saddhiṃ saṃsanditvāva kathetī''ti sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññissantītipi ajānanto viya pucchati.

[03] ^b^chandamūlakā^eb^ti taṇhāchandamūlakā. ^b^na kho bhikkhu taññeva upādānaṃ te pañcupādānakkhandhā^eb^ti yasmā chandarāgamattaṃ pañcakkhandhā na hoti, tasmā idaṃ vuttaṃ. yasmā pana sahajātato vā ārammaṇato vā khandhe muñcitvā upādānaṃ natthi, tasmā ^b^nāpi aññatra pañcahi^eb^ ^a^V2.0272^ea^ ^b^upādānakkhandhehi upādāna^eb^nti vuttaṃ. taṇhāsampayuttasmiñhi citte vattamāne taṃcittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ rūpakkhandho, ṭhapetvā taṃ taṇhaṃ sesā arūpadhammā cattāro khandhāti sahajātatopi khandhe muñcitvā upādānaṃ natthi. upādānassa pana rūpādīsu aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjanato ārammaṇatopi pañcakkhandhe muñcitvā upādānaṃ natthi. ^b^chandarāgavemattatā^eb^ti chandarāganānattaṃ. ^b^evaṃ kho bhikkhū^eb^ti evaṃ rūpārammaṇassa chandarāgassa ^a^M2.0283^ea^ vedanādīsu aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ akaraṇato siyā chandarāgavemattatā. ^b^khandhādhivacana^eb^nti ^a^P2.0308^ea^ khandhāti ayaṃ paññatti. ayaṃ pana anusandhi na ghaṭiyati, kiñcāpi na ghaṭiyati, sānusandhikāva pucchā, sānusandhikaṃ vissajjanaṃ. ayañhi thero tesaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhāsayena pucchati, satthāpi tesaṃ tesaṃ ajjhāsayeneva vissajjeti. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva. dasamaṃ.
[03] imassa ca pana vaggassa ekekasmiṃ sutte pañcasatā pañcasatā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pattāti.
[06] khajjanīyavaggo aṭṭhamo.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ theravaggassa paṭhame ^b^mantāṇiputto^eb^ti, mantāṇiyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā putto. ^b^upādāyā^eb^ti āgamma ārabbha sandhāya paṭicca. ^b^asmīti hotī^eb^ti asmīti evaṃ pavattaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcattayaṃ hoti. ^b^daharo^eb^ti taruṇo. ^b^yuvā^eb^ti yobbanena samannāgato. ^b^maṇḍanakajātiko^eb^ti maṇḍanakasabhāvo maṇḍanakasīlo. ^b^mukhanimitta^eb^nti mukhapaṭibimbaṃ. tañhi parisuddhaṃ ādāsamaṇḍalaṃ paṭicca paññāyati. kiṃ pana taṃ olokayato sakamukhaṃ paññāyati, paramukhanti? yadi sakaṃ bhaveyya, parammukhaṃ hutvā paññāyeyya, atha parassa bhaveyya, vaṇṇādīhi asadisaṃ hutvā paññāyeyya. tasmā na taṃ attano, na parassa, ādāsaṃ pana nissāya nibhāsarūpaṃ nāma taṃ paññāyatīti vadanti. atha yaṃ udake paññāyati, taṃ kena kāraṇenāti ^a^V2.0273^ea^? mahābhūtānaṃ visuddhatāya. ^b^dhammo me abhisamito^eb^ti mayā ñāṇena catusaccadhammo abhisamāgato, sotāpannosmi jātoti kathesi. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^M2.0284^ea^ ^a^P2.0309^ea^ ^b^madhurakajāto viyā^eb^ti sañjātagarubhāvo viya akammañño. ^b^disāpi me^eb^ti ayaṃ puratthimā ayaṃ dakkhiṇāti evaṃ disāpi mayhaṃ na pakkhāyanti, na pākaṭā hontīti vadati. ^b^dhammāpi maṃ na paṭibhantī^eb^ti pariyattidhammāpi mayhaṃ na upaṭṭhahanti, uggahitaṃ sajjhāyitaṃ na dissatīti vadati. ^b^vicikicchā^eb^ti no mahāvicikicchā. na hi tassa ``sāsanaṃ niyyānikaṃ nu kho, na nu kho''ti vimati uppajjati. evaṃ panassa hoti ``sakkhissāmi nu kho samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ, udāhu pattacīvaradhāraṇamattameva karissāmī''ti.

[03] ^b^kāmānametaṃ adhivacana^eb^nti yathā hi ninnaṃ pallalaṃ olokentassa dassanarāmaṇeyyakamattaṃ atthi, yo panettha otarati, taṃ caṇḍamīnākulatāya ākaḍḍhitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpeti, evamevaṃ pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cakkhudvārādīnaṃ ārammaṇe rāmaṇeyyakamattaṃ atthi, yo panettha gedhaṃ āpajjati, taṃ ākaḍḍhitvā nirayādīsu eva pakkhipanti. appassādā hi kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyoti imaṃ atthavasaṃ paṭicca ``kāmānametaṃ adhivacana''nti vuttaṃ. ^b^ahamanuggahenā^eb^ti ahaṃ dhammāmisānuggahehi ^a^P2.0310^ea^ anuggaṇhāmi. ^b^abhinandī^eb^ti sampaṭicchi. na kevalañca abhinandi, imaṃ pana satthu santikā assāsaṃ labhitvā ghaṭento vāyamanto katipāhena arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^diṭṭhigata^eb^nti sace hissa evaṃ bhaveyya ``saṅkhārā uppajjanti ceva nirujjhanti ca, saṅkhārappavattameva appavattaṃ hotī''ti, diṭṭhigataṃ nāma na bhaveyya, sāsanāvacarikaṃ ñāṇaṃ bhaveyya. yasmā panassa ``satto ucchijjati vinassatī''ti ahosi, tasmā diṭṭhigataṃ nāma jātaṃ. ^b^thāmasā parāmāsā^eb^ti diṭṭhithāmena ceva diṭṭhiparāmāsena ca.

[03] ^b^yenāyasmā^eb^ ^a^V2.0274^ea^ ^b^sāriputto^eb^ti yathā nāma paccante kupite taṃ vūpasametuṃ asakkontā rājapurisā senāpatissa vā rañño vā santikaṃ gacchanti, evaṃ diṭṭhigatavasena tasmiṃ there kupite taṃ vūpasametuṃ asakkontā te bhikkhū yena dhammarājassa dhammasenāpati āyasmā sāriputto ^a^M2.0285^ea^, tenupasaṅkamiṃsu. ^b^evaṃbyākho^eb^ti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike viya therassa sammukhā paggayha vattuṃ asakkonto olambantena hadayena ``evaṃbyākho''ti āha. ^b^taṃ kiṃ maññasi, āvuso^eb^ti? idaṃ thero tassa vacanaṃ sutvā, ``nāyaṃ attano laddhiyaṃ dosaṃ passati, dhammadesanāya assa taṃ pākaṭaṃ karissāmī''ti cintetvā tiparivaṭṭaṃ desanaṃ desetuṃ ārabhi.

[03] ^b^taṃ kiṃ maññasi, āvuso yamaka, rūpaṃ tathāgato^eb^ti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ? anuyogavattaṃ dāpanatthaṃ. tiparivaṭṭadesanāvasānasmiñhi thero sotāpanno jāto. atha naṃ anuyogavattaṃ dāpetuṃ ``taṃ kiṃ maññasī''tiādimāha? ^b^tathāgato^eb^ti ^a^P2.0311^ea^ satto. rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti ime pañcakkhandhe sampiṇḍetvā ``tathāgato''ti samanupassasīti pucchati. ^b^ettha ca te, āvuso^eb^ti idaṃ therassa anuyoge bhummaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ettha ca te ettake ṭhāne diṭṭheva dhamme saccato thirato satte anupalabbhiyamāneti. ^b^sace taṃ, āvuso^eb^ti idametaṃ aññaṃ byākarāpetukāmo pucchati. ^b^yaṃ dukkhaṃ taṃ niruddha^eb^nti yaṃ dukkhaṃ, tadeva niruddhaṃ, añño satto nirujjhanako nāma natthi, evaṃ byākareyyanti attho.

[03] ^b^etasseva atthassā^eb^ti etassa paṭhamamaggassa. ^b^bhiyyosomattāya ñāṇāyā^eb^ti atirekappamāṇassa ñāṇassa atthāya, sahavipassanakānaṃ upari ca tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ āvibhāvatthāyāti attho. ^b^ārakkhasampanno^eb^ti antoārakkhena ceva bahiārakkhena ca samannāgato. ^b^ayogakkhemakāmo^eb^ti catūhi yogehi khemabhāvaṃ anicchanto. ^b^pasayhā^eb^ti pasayhitvā abhibhavitvā. ^b^anupakhajjā^eb^ti anupavisitvā.

[03] ^b^pubbuṭṭhāyī^eb^tiādīsu dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā āsanato paṭhamataraṃ vuṭṭhātīti ^b^pubbuṭṭhāyī^eb^. tassa āsanaṃ datvā tasmiṃ nisinne pacchā nipatati nisīdatīti, ^b^pacchānipātī^eb^. pātova vuṭṭhāya ``ettakā kasituṃ gacchatha, ettakā vapitu''nti vā sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuṭṭhātīti ^b^pubbuṭṭhāyī^eb^. sāyaṃ sabbesu attano attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gatesu gehassa samantato ārakkhaṃ saṃvidhāya dvārāni thaketvā sabbapacchā nipajjanatopi ^b^pacchānipātī^eb^. ``kiṃ karomi ^a^M2.0286^ea^, ayyaputta ^a^V2.0275^ea^? kiṃ karomi ayyaputtā''ti? mukhaṃ olokento kiṃkāraṃ paṭisāvetīti ^b^kiṃkārapaṭissāvī^eb^. manāpaṃ caratīti ^b^manāpacārī^eb^. piyaṃ vadatīti ^b^piyavādī. mittatopi naṃ saddaheyyā^eb^ti mitto me ayanti saddaheyya. ^b^vissāsaṃ āpajjeyyā^eb^ti ekato pānabhojanādiṃ karonto vissāsiko bhaveyya. ^b^saṃvissattho^eb^ti suṭṭhu vissattho.

[03] ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- bālagahapatiputto viya hi vaṭṭasannissitakāle assutavā puthujjano ^a^P2.0312^ea^, vadhakapaccāmitto viya abaladubbalā pañcakkhandhā, vadhakapaccāmittassa ``bālagahapatiputtaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī''ti upagatakālo viya paṭisandhikkhaṇe upagatā pañcakkhandhā, tassa hi ``na me ayaṃ sahāyo, vadhakapaccatthiko aya''nti ajānanakālo viya vaṭṭanissitaputhujjanassa pañcakkhandhe ``na ime mayha''nti agahetvā ``mama rūpaṃ, mama vedanā, mama saññā, mama saṅkhārā, mama viññāṇa''nti gahitakālo, vadhakapaccatthikassa ``mitto me aya''nti gahetvā sakkārakaraṇakālo viya ``mama ime''ti gahetvā pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nhāpanabhojanādīhi sakkārakaraṇakālo, ``ativissattho me aya''nti ñatvā sakkāraṃ karontasseva asinā sīsacchindanaṃ viya vissatthassa bālaputhujjanassa tikhiṇehi bhijjamānehi khandhehi jīvitapariyādānaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^upetī^eb^ti upagacchati. ^b^upādiyatī^eb^ti gaṇhāti. ^b^adhiṭṭhātī^eb^ti adhitiṭṭhati. ^b^attā me^eb^ti ayaṃ me attāti. ^b^sutavā ca kho, āvuso, ariyasāvako^eb^ti yathā pana paṇḍito gahapatiputto evaṃ upagataṃ paccatthikaṃ ``paccatthiko me aya''nti ñatvā appamatto tāni tāni kammāni kāretvā anatthaṃ pariharati, atthaṃ pāpuṇāti, evaṃ sutavā ariyasāvakopi ``na rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī''tiādinā nayena pañcakkhandhe ahanti vā mamanti vā agahetvā, ``paccatthikā me ete''ti ñatvā rūpasattakārūpasattakādivasena vipassanāya yojetvāva tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ parivajjetvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. sesamettha uttānameva. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^araññakuṭikāya^eb^nti tasseva vihārassa paccante paṇṇasālāyaṃ. ^b^taṃ tathāgato^eb^ti tumhākaṃ satthā tathāgato taṃ sattaṃ ^a^M2.0287^ea^ tathāgataṃ. ^b^aññatra imehī^eb^ti tassa kira evaṃ ahosi ^a^V2.0276^ea^ ``ime sāsanassa paṭipakkhā paṭivilomā, yathā ime bhaṇanti, na evaṃ satthā paññāpessati, aññathā paññāpessatī''ti. tasmā evamāha. ^b^evaṃ vutte te aññatitthiyā^eb^ti evaṃ therena attano ca paresañca samayaṃ ajānitvā vutte ekadesena sāsanasamayaṃ jānantā ^a^P2.0313^ea^ therassa vāde dosaṃ dātukāmā te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā āyasmantaṃ anurādhaṃ etadavocuṃ.

[03] ^b^taṃ kiṃ maññasi anurādhā^eb^ti satthā tassa kathaṃ sutvā cintesi -- ``ayaṃ bhikkhu attano laddhiyaṃ dosaṃ na jānāti, kārako panesa yuttayogo, dhammadesanāya eva naṃ jānāpessāmī''ti tiparivaṭṭaṃ desanaṃ desetukāmo ``taṃ kiṃ maññasi, anurādhā''tiādimāha. athassa tāya desanāya arahattappattassa anuyogavattaṃ āropento ^b^taṃ kiṃ maññasi, anurādha? rūpaṃ tathāgato^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^dukkhañceva paññapemi, dukkhassa ca nirodha^eb^nti vaṭṭadukkhañceva vaṭṭadukkhassa ca nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ paññapemi. dukkhanti vā vacanena dukkhasaccaṃ gahitaṃ. tasmiṃ gahite samudayasaccaṃ gahitameva hoti, tassa mūlattā. nirodhanti vacanena nirodhasaccaṃ gahitaṃ. tasmiṃ gahite maggasaccaṃ gahitameva hoti tassa upāyattā. iti pubbe cāhaṃ, anurādha, etarahi ca catusaccameva paññapemīti dasseti. evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ. catutthaṃ.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^kumbhakāranivesane^eb^ti kumbhakārasālāyaṃ. thero kira vutthavasso pavāretvā bhagavantaṃ dassanāya āgacchati. tassa nagaramajjhe mahāābādho uppajji, pādā na vahanti. atha naṃ mañcakasivikāya kumbhakārasālaṃ āhariṃsu. sā ca sālā tesaṃ kammasālā, na nivesanasālā. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``kumbhakāranivesane viharatī''ti. ^b^bāḷhagilāno^eb^ti adhimattagilāno. ^b^samadhosī^eb^ti samantato adhosi, calanākārena apacitiṃ dassesi. vattaṃ kiretaṃ bāḷhagilānenapi buḍḍhataraṃ disvā uṭṭhānākārena apaciti dassetabbā. tena pana ``mā cali mā calī''ti vattabbo. ^b^santimāni āsanānī^eb^ti buddhakālasmiñhi ekassapi bhikkhuno ^a^M2.0288^ea^ vasanaṭṭhāne ^a^P2.0314^ea^ ``sace satthā āgacchissati, idha nisīdissatī''ti āsanaṃ paññattameva hoti antamaso phalakamattampi paṇṇasanthāramattampi. ^b^khamanīyaṃ yāpanīya^eb^nti kacci dukkhaṃ khamituṃ iriyāpathaṃ vā yāpetuṃ sakkāti pucchati. ^b^paṭikkamantī^eb^ti nivattanti. ^b^abhikkamantī^eb^ti adhigacchanti ^a^V2.0277^ea^. ^b^paṭikkamosāna^eb^nti paṭikkamo etāsaṃ. ^b^sīlato na upavadatī^eb^ti sīlaṃ ārabbha sīlabhāvena na upavadati. ^b^cirapaṭikāha^eb^nti cirapaṭiko ahaṃ, cirato paṭṭhāya ahanti attho. ^b^pūtikāyenā^eb^ti attano suvaṇṇavaṇṇampi kāyaṃ bhagavā dhuvapaggharaṇaṭṭhena evamāha. ^b^yo kho, vakkali, dhamma^eb^nti idha bhagavā ``dhammakāyo kho, mahārāja, tathāgato''ti vuttaṃ dhammakāyataṃ dasseti. navavidho hi lokuttaradhammo tathāgatassa kāyo nāma.

[03] idāni therassa tiparivaṭṭadhammadesanaṃ ārabhanto ^b^taṃ kiṃ maññasī^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^kāḷasilā^eb^ti kāḷasilāvihāro. ^b^vimokkhāyā^eb^ti maggavimokkhatthāya. ^b^suvimutto vimuccissatī^eb^ti arahattaphalavimuttiyā vimutto hutvā vimuccissati. tā kira devatā ``yena nīhārena iminā vipassanā āraddhā, anantarāyena arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī''ti ñatvā evamāhaṃsu. ^b^apāpaka^eb^nti alāmakaṃ. ^b^satthaṃ āharesī^eb^ti thero kira adhimāniko ahosi. so samādhivipassanāhi vikkhambhitānaṃ kilesānaṃ samudācāraṃ apassanto ``khīṇāsavomhī''ti saññī hutvā ``kiṃ me iminā dukkhena jīvitena? satthaṃ āharitvā marissāmī''ti tikhiṇena satthena kaṇṭhanāḷaṃ chindi. athassa dukkhā vedanā uppajji. so tasmiṃ khaṇe attano puthujjanabhāvaṃ ñatvā avissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānattā sīghaṃ mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ ādāya sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvāva kālamakāsi. paccavekkhaṇā panassa ca kathaṃ ahosīti? khīṇāsavassa ekūnavīsati ^a^P2.0315^ea^ paccavekkhaṇā na sabbāva avassaṃ laddhabbā, tikhiṇenāpi pana asinā sīse chijjante ekaṃ dve ñāṇāni avassaṃ uppajjanti.

[03] ^b^vivattakkhandha^eb^nti parivattakkhandhaṃ. ^b^semāna^eb^nti sayamānaṃ. thero kira uttānako nipanno satthaṃ āhari. tassa sarīraṃ yathāṭhitameva ahosi. sīsaṃ pana dakkhiṇapassena parivattitvā aṭṭhāsi. ariyasāvakā hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapasseneva kālaṃ karonti. tenassa sarīraṃ yathāṭhitaṃyeva ahosi. sīsaṃ pana dakkhiṇapassena parivattitvā ṭhitaṃ. taṃ sandhāya vivattakkhandho nāma jātotipi vadanti. ^b^dhūmāyitatta^eb^nti dhūmāyanabhāvaṃ ^a^M2.0289^ea^. ^b^timirāyitatta^eb^nti timirāyanabhāvaṃ. dhūmavalāhakaṃ viya timiravalāhakaṃ viya cāti attho. pañcamaṃ.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^kassapakārāme^eb^ti kassapaseṭṭhinā kārite ārāme. ^b^kāyasaṅkhāre^eb^ti assāsapassāse ^a^V2.0278^ea^. so hi te catutthajjhānena passambhitvā passambhitvā vihāsi. ^b^evaṃ hotī^eb^ti idāni taṃ samādhiṃ appaṭilabhantassa evaṃ hoti. ^b^no cassāhaṃ parihāyāmī^eb^ti kacci nu kho ahaṃ sāsanato na parihāyāmi? tassa kira ābādhadosena appitappitā samāpatti parihāyi, tasmā evaṃ cintesi. ^b^samādhisārakā samādhisāmaññā^eb^ti samādhiṃyeva sārañca sāmaññañca maññanti. mayhaṃ pana sāsane na etaṃ sāraṃ, vipassanāmaggaphalāni sāraṃ. so tvaṃ samādhito parihāyanto kasmā cintesi ``sāsanato parihāyāmī''ti. evaṃ theraṃ assāsetvā idānissa tiparivaṭṭaṃ dhammadesanaṃ ārabhanto ^b^taṃ kiṃ maññasī^eb^tiādimāha. athassa tiparivaṭṭadesanāvasāne arahattaṃ pattassa satatavihāraṃ dassento ^b^so sukhaṃ ce vedanaṃ vedayatī^eb^tiādimāha ^a^P2.0316^ea^. tattha ^b^anabhinanditāti pajānātī^eb^ti sukhavedanāya tāva abhinandanā hotu, dukkhavedanāya kathaṃ hotīti? dukkhaṃ patvā sukhaṃ pattheti, yadaggena sukhaṃ pattheti, tadaggena dukkhaṃ patthetiyeva. sukhavipariṇāmena hi dukkhaṃ āgatameva hotīti evaṃ dukkhe abhinandanā veditabbā. sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayamevāti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^attaniya^eb^nti attano parikkhārajātaṃ. ^b^asmīti adhigata^eb^nti asmīti evaṃ pavattā taṇhāmānā adhigatā. ^b^sandhāvanikāyā^eb^ti punappunaṃ gamanāgamanena. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti badarikārāmato gāvutamattaṃ ghositārāmaṃ agamāsi. dāsakatthero pana catukkhattuṃ gamanāgamanena taṃdivasaṃ dviyojanaṃ addhānaṃ āhiṇḍi. kasmā pana taṃ therā pahiṇiṃsu? vissutassa dhammakathikassa santikā dhammaṃ suṇissāmāti. sayaṃ kasmā na gatāti? therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ araññaṃ sambādhaṃ, tattha saṭṭhimattānaṃ therānaṃ ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā okāso natthīti na gatā. ``idhāgantvā amhākaṃ dhammaṃ kathetū''tipi ^a^M2.0290^ea^ kasmā pana na pahiṇiṃsūti? therassa ābādhikattā. atha kasmā punappunaṃ pahiṇiṃsūti? sayameva ñatvā amhākaṃ kathetuṃ āgamissatīti. theropi tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvāva agamāsīti.

[03] ^b^na khvāhaṃ, āvuso, rūpa^eb^nti yo hi rūpameva asmīti vadati, tena itare cattāro khandhā paccakkhātā honti. yo aññatra rūpā vadati, tena rūpaṃ paccakkhātaṃ hoti. vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. therassa pana samūhato pañcasupi khandhesu asmīti adhigato, tasmā ^a^V2.0279^ea^ evamāha. ^b^hotevā^eb^ti hotiyeva. ^b^anusahagato^eb^ti sukhumo. ^b^ūse^eb^ti chārikākhāre. ^b^khāre^eb^ti ūsakhāre. ^b^sammadditvā^eb^ti temetvā khādetvā.

[03] ^b^evameva^eb^ ^a^P2.0317^ea^ ^b^kho^eb^ti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- kiliṭṭhavatthaṃ viya hi puthujjanassa cittācāro, tayo khārā viya tisso anupassanā, tīhi khārehi dhotavatthaṃ viya desanāya madditvā ṭhito anāgāmino cittācāro, anusahagato ūsādigandho viya arahattamaggavajjhā kilesā, gandhakaraṇḍako viya arahattamaggañāṇaṃ gandhakaraṇḍakaṃ āgamma anusahagatānaṃ ūsagandhādīnaṃ samugghāto viya arahattamaggena sabbakilesakkhayo, gandhaparibhāvitavatthaṃ nivāsetvā chaṇadivase antaravīthiyaṃ sugandhagandhino vicaraṇaṃ viya khīṇāsavassa sīlagandhādīhi dasa disā upavāyantassa yathākāmacāro.

[03] ^b^ācikkhitu^eb^nti kathetuṃ. ^b^desetu^eb^nti pakāsetuṃ. ^b^paññāpetu^eb^nti jānāpetuṃ. ^b^paṭṭhapetu^eb^nti patiṭṭhāpetuṃ. ^b^vivaritu^eb^nti vivaṭaṃ kātuṃ. ^b^vibhajitu^eb^nti suvibhattaṃ kātuṃ. ^b^uttānīkātu^eb^nti uttānakaṃ kātuṃ. ^b^saṭṭhimattānaṃ therāna^eb^nti te kira therena kathitakathitaṭṭhāne vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā uparūpari sammasantā desanāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. theropi aññena nīhārena akathetvā vipassanāsahagatacitteneva kathesi. tasmā sopi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ -- ``saṭṭhimattānaṃ therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu āyasmato khemakassa cā''ti. sattamaṃ.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^M2.0291^ea^ ^b^āyasmā channo^eb^ti tathāgatena saddhiṃ ekadivase jāto mahābhinikkhamanadivase saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā puna aparabhāge satthu santike pabbajitvā ``amhākaṃ buddho amhākaṃ dhammo''ti evaṃ makkhī ceva paḷāsī ca hutvā sabrahmacārīnaṃ pharusavācāya saṅghaṭṭanaṃ karonto thero. ^b^avāpuraṇaṃ ādāyā^eb^ti kuñcikaṃ gahetvā. ^b^vihārena vihāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā^eb^ti ekaṃ vihāraṃ pavisitvā tato aññaṃ, tato aññanti evaṃ tena tena vihārena taṃ taṃ vihāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā. ^b^etadavoca ovadantu ma^eb^nti kasmā evaṃ mahantena ussāhena tattha tattha gantvā etaṃ avocāti? uppannasaṃvegatāya. tassa hi parinibbute satthari dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi pesito āyasmā ^a^V2.0280^ea^ ānando kosambiṃ ^a^P2.0318^ea^ gantvā brahmadaṇḍaṃ adāsi. so dinne brahmadaṇḍe sañjātapariḷāho visaññībhūto patitvā puna saññaṃ labhitvā vuṭṭhāya ekassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gato, so tena saddhiṃ kiñci na kathesi. aññassa santikaṃ agamāsi, sopi na kathesīti evaṃ sakalavihāraṃ vicaritvā nibbinno pattacīvaraṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gantvā uppannasaṃvego tattha tattha gantvā evaṃ avoca.

[03] ^b^sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā^eb^ti sabbe tebhūmakasaṅkhārā aniccā. ^b^sabbe dhammā anattā^eb^ti sabbe catubhūmakadhammā anattā. iti sabbepi te bhikkhū theraṃ ovadantā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ anattalakkhaṇanti dveva lakkhaṇāni kathetvā dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ na kathayiṃsu. kasmā? evaṃ kira nesaṃ ahosi -- ``ayaṃ bhikkhu vādī dukkhalakkhaṇe paññāpiyamāne rūpaṃ dukkhaṃ...pe0... viññāṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, maggo dukkho, phalaṃ dukkhanti `tumhe dukkhappattā bhikkhū nāmā'ti gahaṇaṃ gaṇheyya, yathā gahaṇaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ niddosamevassa katvā kathessāmā''ti dveva lakkhaṇāni kathayiṃsu.

[03] ^b^paritassanā upādānaṃ uppajjatī^eb^ti paritassanā ca upādānañca uppajjati. ^b^paccudāvattati mānasaṃ, atha ko carahi me attā^eb^ti yadi rūpādīsu ekopi anattā, atha ko nāma me attāti evaṃ paṭinivattati ``mayhaṃ mānasa''nti. ayaṃ kira thero paccaye apariggahetvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, sāssa dubbalavipassanā attagāhaṃ pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇantī saṅkhāresu suññato ^a^M2.0292^ea^ upaṭṭhahantesu ``ucchijjissāmi vinassissāmī''ti ucchedadiṭṭhiyā ceva paritassanāya ca paccayo ahosi. so ca attānaṃ pāpate papatantaṃ viya disvā, ``paritassanā upādānaṃ uppajjati, paccudāvattati mānasaṃ, atha ko carahi me attā''ti āha. ^b^na kho panevaṃ dhammaṃ passato hotī^eb^ti catusaccadhammaṃ passantassa evaṃ na hoti. ^b^tāvatikā vissaṭṭhī^eb^ti tattako vissāso. ^b^sammukhā meta^eb^nti thero tassa vacanaṃ sutvā, ``kīdisā nu kho imassa dhammadesanā sappāyā''ti? cintento tepiṭakaṃ ^a^P2.0319^ea^ buddhavacanaṃ vicinitvā kaccānasuttaṃ (saṃ0 ni0 2.15) addasa ``idaṃ āditova diṭṭhiviniveṭhanaṃ katvā majjhe buddhabalaṃ dīpetvā saṇhasukhumapaccayākāraṃ pakāsayamānaṃ gataṃ, idamassa desessāmī''ti dassento ``sammukhā meta''ntiādimāha. aṭṭhamaṃ.
[03] 91-92^b^.^eb^ navamadasamāni ^a^V2.0281^ea^ rāhulasaṃyutte (saṃ0 ni0 2.188) vuttatthāneva. kevalaṃ hetāni ayaṃ theravaggoti katvā idhāgatānīti. navamadasamāni.
[06] theravaggo navamo.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ pupphavaggassa paṭhame ^b^pabbateyyā^eb^ti pabbate pavattā. ^b^ohārinī^eb^ti sote patitapatitāni tiṇapaṇṇakaṭṭhādīni heṭṭhāhārinī. ^b^dūraṅgamā^eb^ti nikkhantaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya catupañcayojanasatagāminī. ^b^sīghasotā^eb^ti caṇḍasotā. ^b^kāsā^eb^tiādīni sabbāni tiṇajātāni. ^b^rukkhā^eb^ti eraṇḍādayo dubbalarukkhā. ^b^te naṃ ajjholambeyyu^eb^nti te tīre jātāpi onamitvā aggehi udakaṃ phusantehi adhiolambeyyuṃ, upari lambeyyunti attho. ^b^palujjeyyu^eb^nti samūlamattikāya saddhiṃ sīse pateyyuṃ. so tehi ajjhotthaṭo vālukamattikodakehi mukhaṃ pavisantehi mahāvināsaṃ pāpuṇeyya.

[03] ^b^evameva^eb^ ^a^M2.0293^ea^ ^b^kho^eb^ti ettha sote patitapuriso viya vaṭṭasannissito bālaputhujjano daṭṭhabbo, ubhatotīre kāsādayo viya dubbalapañcakkhandhā, ``ime gahitāpi maṃ tāretuṃ na sakkhissantī''ti tassa purisassa ajānitvā gahaṇaṃ viya ime khandhā ``na mayhaṃ sahāyā''ti bālaputhujjanassa ajānitvā catūhi gāhehi gahaṇaṃ, gahitagahitānaṃ palujjanattā purisassa byasanappatti viya catūhi gāhehi gahitānaṃ khandhānaṃ vipariṇāme bālaputhujjanassa sokādibyasanappatti veditabbā. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^V2.0282^ea^ ^a^P2.0320^ea^ ^b^vivadatī^eb^ti ``aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā asubha''nti yathāsabhāvena vadantena saddhiṃ ``niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā subha''nti vadanto vivadati. ^b^lokadhammo^eb^ti khandhapañcakaṃ. tañhi lujjanasabhāvattā lokadhammoti vuccati. ^b^kinti karomī^eb^ti kathaṃ karomi? mayhañhi paṭipattikathanameva bhāro, paṭipattipūraṇaṃ pana kulaputtānaṃ bhāroti dasseti. imasmiṃ sutte tayo lokā kathitā. ``nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, lokenā''ti ettha hi sattaloko kathito, ``atthi, bhikkhave, loke lokadhammo''ti ettha saṅkhāraloko, ``tathāgato loke jāto loke saṃvaḍḍho''ti ettha okāsaloko kathito. dutiyaṃ.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre^eb^ti ayujjhapuravāsino aparimāṇabhikkhuparivāraṃ cārikaṃ caramānaṃ tathāgataṃ attano nagaraṃ sampattaṃ disvā ekasmiṃ gaṅgāya nivattanaṭṭhāne mahāvanasaṇḍamaṇḍitappadese satthu vihāraṃ katvā adaṃsu. bhagavā tattha viharati. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre''ti. ^b^tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesī^eb^ti tasmiṃ vihāre vasanto bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā gaṅgātīre paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno gaṅgāya nadiyā āgacchantaṃ mahantaṃ pheṇapiṇḍaṃ disvā, ``mama sāsane pañcakkhandhanissitaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ kathessāmī''ti cintetvā parivāretvā nisinne bhikkhū āmantesi.

[03] ^b^mahantaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0294^ea^ ^b^pheṇapiṇḍa^eb^nti uṭṭhānuṭṭhāne badarapakkappamāṇato paṭṭhāya anusotāgamanena anupubbena pavaḍḍhitvā pabbatakūṭamattaṃ jātaṃ, yattha udakasappādayo anekapāṇayo nivasanti, evarūpaṃ mahantaṃ pheṇapiṇḍaṃ. ^b^āvaheyyā^eb^ti āhareyya. so panāyaṃ pheṇapiṇḍo uṭṭhitaṭṭhānepi bhijjati ^a^P2.0321^ea^, thokaṃ gantvāpi, ekadviyojanādivasena dūraṃ gantvāpi, antarā pana abhijjantopi mahāsamuddaṃ patvā avassameva bhijjati. ^b^nijjhāyeyyā^eb^ti olokeyya. ^b^yoniso upaparikkheyyā^eb^ti kāraṇena upaparikkheyya. ^b^kiñhi siyā, bhikkhave, pheṇapiṇḍe sāro^eb^ti, bhikkhave, pheṇapiṇḍamhi sāro nāma kiṃ bhaveyya? vilīyitvā viddhaṃseyyeva.

[03] ^b^evameva^eb^ ^a^V2.0283^ea^ ^b^kho^eb^ti yathā pheṇapiṇḍo nissāro, evaṃ rūpampi niccasāradhuvasārāttasāravirahena nissārameva. yathā ca so ``iminā pattaṃ vā thālakaṃ vā karissāmī''ti gahetuṃ na sakkā, gahitopi tamatthaṃ na sādheti, bhijjati eva, evaṃ rūpampi niccanti vā dhuvanti vā ahanti vā mamanti vā gahetuṃ na sakkā, gahitampi na tathā tiṭṭhati, aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā asubhaññeva hotīti evaṃ pheṇapiṇḍasadisameva hoti. yathā vā pana pheṇapiṇḍo chiddāvachiddo anekasandhighaṭito bahūnaṃ udakasappādīnaṃ pāṇānaṃ āvāso, evaṃ rūpampi chiddāvachiddaṃ anekasandhighaṭitaṃ, kulavasenevettha asīti kimikulāni vasanti, tadeva tesaṃ sūtigharampi vaccakuṭipi gilānasālāpi susānampi, na te aññattha gantvā gabbhavuṭṭhānādīni karonti, evampi pheṇapiṇḍasadisaṃ.

[03] yathā ca pheṇapiṇḍo ādito badarapakkamatto hutvā anupubbena pabbatakūṭamattopi hoti, evaṃ rūpampi ādito kalalamattaṃ hutvā anupubbena byāmamattampi gomahiṃsahatthiādīnaṃ vasena pabbatakūṭādimattaṃ hoti macchakacchapādīnaṃ vasena anekayojanasatapamāṇampi, evampi pheṇapiṇḍasadisaṃ. yathā ca pheṇapiṇḍo uṭṭhitamattopi bhijjati, thokaṃ gantvāpi, dūraṃ gantvāpi, samuddaṃ patvā pana avassameva bhijjati, evamevaṃ rūpampi kalalabhāvepi bhijjati abbudādibhāvepi, antarā pana abhijjamānampi vassasatāyukānaṃ vassasataṃ patvā avassameva bhijjati, maraṇamukhe cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hoti, evampi pheṇapiṇḍasadisaṃ.

[01] ^b^kiñhi^eb^ ^a^M2.0295^ea^ ^a^P2.0322^ea^ ^b^siyā, bhikkhave, vedanāya sāro^eb^tiādīsu vedanādīnaṃ pubbuḷādīhi evaṃ sadisatā veditabbā. yathā hi pubbuḷo asāro evaṃ vedanāpi. yathā ca so abalo agayhūpago, na sakkā taṃ gahetvā phalakaṃ vā āsanaṃ vā kātuṃ, gahitopi bhijjateva, evaṃ vedanāpi abalā agayhūpagā, na sakkā niccāti vā dhuvāti vā gahetuṃ, gahitāpi na tathā tiṭṭhati, evaṃ agayhūpagatāyapi vedanā pubbuḷasadisā. yathā pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ udakabindumhi pubbuḷo uppajjati ceva bhijjati ca, na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti, evaṃ vedanāpi uppajjati ceva bhijjati ca, na ciraṭṭhitikā hoti. ekaccharakkhaṇe koṭisatasahassasaṅkhā uppajjitvā nirujjhati. yathā ca pubbuḷo udakatalaṃ, udakabinduṃ, udakajallaṃ, saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ katvā gahaṇavātañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati, evaṃ vedanāpi vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ kilesajallaṃ phassasaṅghaṭṭanañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati. evampi vedanā pubbuḷasadisā.

[03] ^b^saññāpi^eb^ ^a^V2.0284^ea^ asārakaṭṭhena marīcisadisā. tathā agayhūpagaṭṭhena. na hi sakkā taṃ gahetvā pivituṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā bhājanaṃ vā pūretuṃ. apica yathā marīci vipphandati, sañjātūmivegā viya khāyati, evaṃ nīlasaññādibhedā saññāpi nīlādianubhavanatthāya phandati vipphandati. yathā ca marīci mahājanaṃ vippalambheti ``puṇṇavāpi viya puṇṇanadī viya dissatī''ti vadāpeti, evaṃ saññāpi vippalambheti, ``idaṃ nīlakaṃ subhaṃ sukhaṃ nicca''nti vadāpeti. pītakādīsupi eseva nayo. evaṃ saññā vippalambhanenāpi marīcisadisā.

[03] ^b^akukkukajāta^eb^nti anto asañjātaghanadaṇḍakaṃ. saṅkhārāpi asārakaṭṭhena kadalikkhandhasadisā, tathā agayhūpagaṭṭhena ^a^P2.0323^ea^. yatheva hi kadalikkhandhato kiñci gahetvā na sakkā gopānasiādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ, upanītampi na tathā hoti, evaṃ saṅkhārāpi na sakkā niccādivasena gahetuṃ, gahitāpi na tathā honti. yathā ca kadalikkhandho bahupattavaṭṭisamodhāno hoti, evaṃ saṅkhārakkhandho bahudhammasamodhāno. yathā ca kadalikkhandho nānālakkhaṇo. aññoyeva hi bāhirāya pattavaṭṭiyā vaṇṇo, añño tato abbhantarābbhantarānaṃ, evameva saṅkhārakkhandhepi ^a^M2.0296^ea^ aññadeva phassassa lakkhaṇaṃ, aññā cetanādīnaṃ, samodhānetvā pana saṅkhārakkhandhova vuccatīti evampi saṅkhārakkhandho kadalikkhandhasadiso.

[01] ^b^cakkhumā puriso^eb^ti maṃsacakkhunā ceva paññācakkhunā cāti dvīhi cakkhūhi cakkhumā. maṃsacakkhumpi hissa parisuddhaṃ vaṭṭati apagatapaṭalapiḷakaṃ, paññācakkhumpi asārabhāvadassanasamatthaṃ. viññāṇampi asārakaṭṭhena māyāsadisaṃ, tathā agayhūpagaṭṭhena. yathā ca māyā ittarā lahupaccupaṭṭhānā, evaṃ viññāṇaṃ. tañhi tatopi ittaratarañceva lahupaccupaṭṭhānatarañca. teneva hi cittena puriso āgato viya gato viya ṭhito viya nisinno viya hoti. aññadeva ca āgamanakāle cittaṃ, aññaṃ gamanakālādīsu. evampi viññāṇaṃ māyāsadisaṃ. māyā ca mahājanaṃ vañceti, yaṃkiñcideva ``idaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ rajataṃ muttā''ti gāhāpeti, viññāṇampi mahājanaṃ vañceti. teneva hi cittena āgacchantaṃ viya gacchantaṃ viya ṭhitaṃ viya nisinnaṃ viya katvā gāhāpeti. aññadeva ca āgamane cittaṃ, aññaṃ gamanādīsu. evampi viññāṇaṃ māyāsadisaṃ.

[03] ^b^bhūripaññenā^eb^ti saṇhapaññena ceva vipulavitthatapaññena ca. ^b^āyū^eb^ti jīvitindriyaṃ. ^b^usmā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0285^ea^ kammajatejodhātu. ^b^parabhatta^eb^nti nānāvidhānaṃ kimigaṇādīnaṃ bhattaṃ hutvā. ^b^etādisāyaṃ santāno^eb^ti etādisī ayaṃ paveṇī matakassa ^a^P2.0324^ea^ yāva susānā ghaṭṭīyatīti. ^b^māyāyaṃ bālalāpinī^eb^ti yvāyaṃ viññāṇakkhandho nāma, ayaṃ bālamahājanalapāpanikamāyā nāma. ^b^vadhako^eb^ti dvīhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ khandhasaṅkhāto vadhako aññamaññaghātanenapi, khandhesu sati vadho paññāyatītipi. ekā hi pathavīdhātu bhijjamānā sesadhātuyo gahetvāva bhijjati, tathā āpodhātuādayo. rūpakkhandho ca bhijjamāno arūpakkhandhe gahetvāva bhijjati, tathā arūpakkhandhesu vedanādayo saññādike. cattāropi cete vatthurūpanti evaṃ aññamaññavadhanenettha vadhakatā veditabbā. khandhesu pana sati vadhabandhanacchedādīni sambhavanti, evaṃ etesu sati vadhabhāvatopi vadhakatā veditabbā. ^b^sabbasaṃyoga^eb^nti sabbaṃ dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ. ^b^accutaṃ pada^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. tatiyaṃ.

[03] 96-98^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M2.0297^ea^ ^b^sassatisama^eb^nti sinerumahāpathavīcandimasūriyādīhi sassatīhi samaṃ. ^b^parittaṃ gomayapiṇḍa^eb^nti appamattakaṃ madhukapupphappamāṇaṃ gomayakhaṇḍaṃ. kuto panānenetaṃ laddhanti. paribhaṇḍakaraṇatthāya ābhatato gahitanti eke. atthassa pana viññāpanatthaṃ iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā hatthāruḷhaṃ katanti veditabbanti. ^b^attabhāvapaṭilābho^eb^ti paṭiladdhāttabhāvo. ^b^na yidaṃ brahmacariyavāso paññāyethā^eb^ti ayaṃ maggabrahmacariyavāso nāma na paññāyeyya. maggo hi tebhūmakasaṅkhāre vivaṭṭento uppajjati. yadi ca ettako attabhāvo nicco bhaveyya, maggo uppajjitvāpi saṅkhāravaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭetuṃ na sakkuṇeyyāti brahmacariyavāso na paññāyetha.

[03] idāni sace koci saṅkhāro nicco bhaveyya, mayā mahāsudassanarājakāle anubhūtā sampatti niccā bhaveyya, sāpi ca aniccāti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^bhūtapubbāhaṃ bhikkhu rājā ahosi^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^kusāvatīrājadhānippamukhānī^eb^ti kusāvatīrājadhānī tesaṃ nagarānaṃ pamukhā, sabbaseṭṭhāti attho. ^b^sāramayānī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0325^ea^ rattacandanasāramayāni. upadhānaṃ pana sabbesaṃ suttamayameva. ^b^goṇakatthatānī^eb^ti caturaṅgulādhikalomena kāḷakojavena atthatāni, yaṃ mahāpiṭṭhiyakojavoti vadanti. ^b^paṭakatthatānī^eb^ti ubhatolomena uṇṇāmayena setakambalena atthatāni. ^b^paṭalikatthatānī^eb^ti ghanapupphena uṇṇāmayāttharaṇena atthatāni. ^b^kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇānī^eb^ti kadalimigacammamayena ^a^V2.0286^ea^ uttamapaccattharaṇena atthatāni. taṃ kira paccattharaṇaṃ setavatthassa upari kadalimigacammaṃ attharitvā sibbetvā karonti. ^b^sauttaracchadānī^eb^ti saha uttaracchadena, upari baddhena rattavitānena saddhinti attho. ^b^ubhatolohitakūpadhānī^eb^ti sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti pallaṅkānaṃ ubhatolohitakūpadhānāni. ^b^vejayantarathappamukhānī^eb^ti ettha vejayanto nāma tassa rañño ratho, yassa cakkānaṃ indanīlamaṇimayā nābhi, sattaratanamayā arā, pavāḷamayā nemi, rajatamayo akkho, indanīlamaṇimayaṃ upakkharaṃ, rajatamayaṃ kubbaraṃ. so tesaṃ rathānaṃ pamukho aggo. ^b^dukūlasandānānī^eb^ti dukūlasantharāni. ^b^kaṃsūpadhāraṇānī^eb^ti rajatamayadohabhājanāni. ^b^vatthakoṭisahassānī^eb^ti yathārucitaṃ ^a^M2.0298^ea^ paribhuñjissatīti nhatvā ṭhitakāle upanītavatthāneva sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^bhattābhihāro^eb^ti abhiharitabbabhattaṃ.

[03] ^b^yamahaṃ tena samayena ajjhāvasāmī^eb^ti yattha vasāmi, taṃ ekaññeva nagaraṃ hoti, avasesesu puttadhītādayo ceva dāsamanussā ca vasiṃsu. pāsādakūṭāgārādīsupi eseva nayo. pallaṅkādīsu ekaṃyeva sayaṃ paribhuñjati, sesā puttādīnaṃ paribhogā honti. itthīsu ekāva paccupaṭṭhāti, sesā parivāramattā honti. ^b^velāmikā^eb^ti khattiyassa vā brāhmaṇiyā, brāhmaṇassa vā khattiyāniyā kucchismiṃ jātā. ^b^paridahāmī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0326^ea^ ekaṃyeva dussayugaṃ nivāsemi, sesāni parivāretvā vicarantānaṃ asītisahassādhikānaṃ soḷasannaṃ purisasatasahassānaṃ hontīti dasseti. ^b^bhuñjāmī^eb^ti paramappamāṇena nāḷikodanamattaṃ bhuñjāmi, sesaṃ parivāretvā vicarantānaṃ cattālīsasahassādhikānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ purisasatasahassānaṃ hotīti dasseti. ekathālipāko hi dasannaṃ janānaṃ pahoti.

[03] iti imaṃ mahāsudassanakāle sampattiṃ dassetvā idāni tassā aniccataṃ dassento ^b^iti kho bhikkhū^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^vipariṇatā^eb^ti pakatijahanena nibbutapadīpo viya apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gatā. ^b^evaṃ aniccā kho bhikkhu saṅkhārā^eb^ti evaṃ hutvāabhāvaṭṭhena aniccā. ettāvatā bhagavā yathā nāma puriso satahatthubbedhe campakarukkhe nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā abhiruhitvā campakapupphaṃ ādāya nisseṇiṃ muñcanto otareyya, evamevaṃ nisseṇiṃ bandhanto viya anekavassakoṭisatasahassubbedhaṃ mahāsudassanasampattiṃ āruyha sampattimatthake ṭhitaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ ādāya nisseṇiṃ muñcanto viya otiṇṇo. ^b^evaṃ addhuvā^eb^ti evaṃ udakapubbuḷādayo viya dhuvabhāvarahitā. ^b^evaṃ anassāsikā^eb^ti evaṃ supinake pītapānīyaṃ viya anulittacandanaṃ viya ca ^a^V2.0287^ea^ assāsavirahitā. iti imasmiṃ sutte aniccalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ. pañcame sabbaṃ vuttanayameva. chaṭṭhaṃ tathā bujjhanakassa ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ. catutthādīni.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^yaṃ mahāsamuddo^eb^ti yasmiṃ samaye pañcame sūriye uṭṭhite mahāsamuddo ussussati. ^b^dukkhassa antakiriya^eb^nti cattāri saccāni appaṭivijjhitvā avijjāya nivutānaṃyeva sataṃ vaṭṭadukkhassa antakiriyaṃ paricchedaṃ ^a^M2.0299^ea^ na vadāmi. ^b^sā gaddulabaddho^eb^ti gaddulena baddhasunakho. ^b^khīle^eb^ti ^a^P2.0327^ea^ pathaviyaṃ ākoṭite mahākhīle. ^b^thambhe^eb^ti nikhaṇitvā ṭhapite thambhe. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha sunakho viya vaṭṭanissito bālo, gaddulo viya diṭṭhi, thambho viya sakkāyo, gaddularajjuyā thambhe upanibaddhasunakhassa thambhānuparivattanaṃ viya diṭṭhitaṇhāya sakkāye baddhassa puthujjanassa sakkāyānuparivattanaṃ veditabbaṃ. sattamaṃ.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā diṭṭhigaddulanissitāya taṇhārajjuyā sakkāyathambhe upanibaddho vaṭṭanissito bālaputhujjano sabbiriyāpathesu khandhapañcakaṃ nissāyeva pavattati, yasmā vā dīgharattamidaṃ cittaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ rāgena dosena mohena, tasmā. ^b^cittasaṃkilesā^eb^ti sunhātāpi hi sattā cittasaṃkileseneva saṃkilissanti, malaggahitasarīrāpi cittassa vodānattā visujjhanti. tenāhu porāṇā --
[21] ``rūpamhi saṃkiliṭṭhamhi, saṃkilissanti māṇavā.
[22] rūpe suddhe visujjhanti, anakkhātaṃ mahesinā..
[21] ``cittamhi saṃkiliṭṭhamhi, saṃkilissanti māṇavā.
[22] citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā''ti..

[03] ^b^caraṇaṃ nāma citta^eb^nti vicaraṇacittaṃ. saṅkhā nāma brāhmaṇapāsaṇḍikā honti, te paṭakoṭṭhakaṃ ^a^V2.0288^ea^ katvā tattha nānappakārā sugatiduggativasena sampattivipattiyo lekhāpetvā, ``imaṃ kammaṃ katvā idaṃ paṭilabhati, idaṃ katvā ida''nti dassentā taṃ cittaṃ gahetvā vicaranti. ^b^citteneva cittita^eb^nti cittakārena cintetvā katattā cittena cintitaṃ nāma. ^b^cittaññeva cittatara^eb^nti tassa cittassa upāyapariyesanacittaṃ tatopi cittataraṃ. ^b^tiracchānagatā pāṇā citteneva cittitā^eb^ti kammacitteneva cittitā. taṃ pana kammacittaṃ ime vaṭṭakatittirādayo ``evaṃ cittā bhavissāmā''ti āyūhantā nāma natthi. kammaṃ pana yoniṃ upaneti, yonimūlako tesaṃ cittabhāvo. yoniupagatā ^a^P2.0328^ea^ hi sattā taṃtaṃyonikehi sadisacittāva honti. iti yonisiddho cittabhāvo, kammasiddhā yonīti veditabbā.

[03] apica ^a^M2.0300^ea^ cittaṃ nāmetaṃ sahajātaṃ sahajātadhammacittatāya bhūmicittatāya vatthucittatāya dvāracittatāya ārammaṇacittatāya kammanānattamūlakānaṃ liṅganānattasaññānānattavohāranānattādīnaṃ anekavidhānaṃ cittānaṃ nipphādanatāyapi tiracchānagatacittato cittatarameva veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^rajako^eb^ti vatthesu raṅgena rūpasamuṭṭhāpanako. so pana acheko amanāpaṃ rūpaṃ karoti, cheko manāpaṃ dassanīyaṃ, evameva puthujjano akusalacittena vā ñāṇavippayuttakusalena vā cakkhusampadādivirahitaṃ virūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, ñāṇasampayuttakusalena cakkhusampadādisampannaṃ abhirūpaṃ. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, kukkuṭiyā aṇḍānī^eb^ti imā kaṇhapakkhasukkapakkhavasena dve upamā vuttā. tāsu kaṇhapakkhaupamā atthassa asādhikā, itarā sādhikāti. sukkapakkhaupamāya evaṃ attho veditabbo -- ^b^seyyathā^eb^ti opammatthe nipāto, ^b^apī^eb^ti sambhāvanatthe. ubhayenāpi seyyathā nāma, bhikkhaveti dasseti. ^b^kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dasa vā dvādasa vā^eb^ti ettha pana kiñcāpi kukkuṭiyā vuttappakārato ūnādhikānipi aṇḍāni honti, vacanasiliṭṭhatāya pana evaṃ vuttaṃ. evañhi loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hoti. ^b^tānassū^eb^ti tāni assu, tāni bhaveyyunti attho. ^b^kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitānī^eb^ti tāya ca janettiyā kukkuṭiyā pakkhe pasāretvā tesaṃ upari sayantiyā sammā ^a^V2.0289^ea^ adhisayitāni. ^b^sammā pariseditānī^eb^ti kālena kālaṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā suṭṭhu samantato seditāni usmīkatāni. ^b^sammā paribhāvitānī^eb^ti kālena kālaṃ suṭṭhu samantato bhāvitāni, kukkuṭagandhaṃ gāhāpitānīti attho. ^b^kiñcāpi tassā kukkuṭiyā^eb^ti tassā kukkuṭiyā iminā tividhakiriyākaraṇena appamādaṃ katvā kiñcāpi na evaṃ icchā upajjeyya. ^b^atha^eb^ ^a^P2.0329^ea^ ^b^kho bhabbāva te^eb^ti atha kho te kukkuṭapotakā vuttanayena sotthinā abhinibbhijjituṃ bhabbāva. te hi yasmā tāya kukkuṭiyā evaṃ tīhākārehi tāni aṇḍāni paripāliyamānāni na pūtīni ^a^M2.0301^ea^ honti, yo nesaṃ allasineho, sopi pariyādānaṃ gacchati, kapālaṃ tanukaṃ hoti, pādanakhasikhā ca mukhatuṇḍakañca kharaṃ hoti, sayampi pariṇāmaṃ gacchanti, kapālassa tanuttā bahi āloko anto paññāyati, tasmā ``ciraṃ vata mayaṃ saṅkuṭitahatthapādā sambādhe sayimhā, ayañca bahi āloko dissati, ettha dāni no sukhavihāro bhavissatī''ti nikkhamitukāmā hutvā kapālaṃ pādena paharanti, gīvaṃ pasārenti, tato taṃ kapālaṃ dvedhā bhijjati. atha te pakkhe vidhunantā taṃkhaṇānurūpaṃ viravantā nikkhamantiyeva, nikkhamitvā ca gāmakkhettaṃ upasobhayamānā vicaranti.

[01] ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti idaṃ opammasampaṭipādanaṃ. taṃ evaṃ atthena saṃsanditvā veditabbaṃ -- tassā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ viya hi imassa bhikkhuno bhāvānuyogaṃ anuyuttakālo, kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyāsampādanena aṇḍānaṃ apūtibhāvo viya bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttassa bhikkhuno tividhānupassanāsampādanena vipassanāñāṇassa aparihāni, tassā tividhakiriyākaraṇena allasinehapariyādānaṃ viya tassa bhikkhuno tividhānupassanāsampādanena bhavattayānugatanikantisinehapariyādānaṃ, aṇḍakapālānaṃ tanubhāvo viya tassa bhikkhuno avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo, kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pādanakhasikhamukhatuṇḍakānaṃ thaddhakharabhāvo viya bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇassa tikkhakharavippasanna sūrabhāvo, kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pariṇāmakālo viya bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇassa pariṇāmakālo vaḍḍhitakālo gabbhaggahaṇakālo, kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā pakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā abhinibbhidākālo viya tassa bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā vicarantassa tajjātikaṃ utusappāyaṃ vā bhojanasappāyaṃ vā puggalasappāyaṃ vā dhammassavanasappāyaṃ vā labhitvā ekāsane nisinnasseva vipassanaṃ ^a^P2.0330^ea^ vaḍḍhentassa anupubbādhigatena arahattamaggena avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhiññāpakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā arahattapattakālo veditabbo. yathā pana kukkuṭapotakānaṃ ^a^V2.0290^ea^ pariṇatabhāvaṃ ñatvā mātāpi aṇḍakosaṃ bhindati, evaṃ tathārūpassa bhikkhuno ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā satthāpi --
[21] ``ucchinda ^a^M2.0302^ea^ sinehamattano, kumudaṃ sāradikaṃva pāṇinā.
[22] santimaggameva brūhaya, nibbānaṃ sugatena desita''nti.. (dha0 pa0 285) --

[25] ādinā nayena obhāsaṃ pharitvā gāthāya avijjaṇḍakosaṃ paharati. so gāthāpariyosāne avijjaṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. tato paṭṭhāya yathā te kukkuṭapotakā gāmakkhettaṃ upasobhayamānā tattha vicaranti, evaṃ ayampi mahākhīṇāsavo nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā saṅghārāmaṃ upasobhayamāno vicarati.

[03] ^b^palagaṇḍassā^eb^ti vaḍḍhakissa. so hi olambakasaṅkhātaṃ palaṃ dhāretvā dārūnaṃ gaṇḍaṃ haratīti palagaṇḍoti vuccati. ^b^vāsijaṭe^eb^ti vāsidaṇḍakassa gahaṇaṭṭhāne. ^b^ettakaṃ vata me ajja āsavānaṃ khīṇa^eb^nti pabbajitassa hi pabbajjāsaṅkhepena uddesena paripucchāya yoniso manasikārena vattapaṭipattiyā ca niccakālaṃ āsavā khīyanti. evaṃ khīyamānānaṃ pana tesaṃ ``ettakaṃ ajja khīṇaṃ, ettakaṃ hiyyo''ti evamassa ñāṇaṃ na hotīti attho. imāya upamāya vipassanāyānisaṃso dīpito. ^b^hemantikenā^eb^ti hemantasamayena. ^b^paṭippassambhantī^eb^ti thirabhāvena parihāyanti.

[03] ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha mahāsamuddo viya sāsanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, nāvā viya yogāvacaro, nāvāya mahāsamudde pariyādānaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno ūnapañcavassakāle ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike vicaraṇaṃ, nāvāya mahāsamuddodakena khajjamānānaṃ bandhanānaṃ tanubhāvo viya bhikkhuno pabbajjāsaṅkhepena uddesaparipucchādīhi ceva saṃyojanānaṃ tanubhāvo, nāvāya thale ukkhittakālo ^a^P2.0331^ea^ viya bhikkhuno nissayamuccakassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe vasanakālo, divā vātātapena saṃsussanaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇena taṇhāsnehasaṃsussanaṃ, rattiṃ himodakena temanaṃ viya kammaṭṭhānaṃ nissāya uppannena pītipāmojjena cittatemanaṃ, rattindivaṃ vātātapena ceva himodakena ca parisukkhaparitintānaṃ bandhanānaṃ dubbalabhāvo viya ekadivasaṃ utusappāyādīni laddhā vipassanāñāṇapītipāmojjehi saṃyojanānaṃ bhiyyosomattāya dubbalabhāvo, pāvussakamegho viya arahattamaggañāṇaṃ ^a^V2.0291^ea^, meghavuṭṭhiudakena nāvāya bandhe pūtibhāvo viya āraddhavipassakassa ^a^M2.0303^ea^ rūpasattakādivasena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa okkhāyamāne pakkhāyamāne kammaṭṭhāne ekadivasaṃ utusappāyādīni laddhā ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa arahattaphalādhigamo, pūtibandhanāvāya kañci kālaṃ ṭhānaṃ viya khīṇasaṃyojanassa arahato mahājanaṃ anuggaṇhantassa yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhānaṃ, pūtibandhanāvāya anupubbena bhijjitvā apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamo viya khīṇāsavassa upādiṇṇakkhandhabhedena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamoti imāya upamāya saṃyojanānaṃ dubbalatā dīpitā. navamaṃ.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^aniccasaññā^eb^ti aniccaṃ aniccanti bhāventassa uppannasaññā. ^b^pariyādiyatī^eb^ti khepayati. ^b^sabbaṃ asmimāna^eb^nti navavidhaṃ asmimānaṃ. ^b^mūlasantānakānī^eb^ti santānetvā ṭhitamūlāni. mahānaṅgalaṃ viya hi aniccasaññā, khuddānukhuddakāni mūlasantānakāni viya kilesā, yathā kassako kasanto naṅgalena tāni padāleti, evaṃ yogī aniccasaññaṃ bhāvento aniccasaññāñāṇena kilese padāletīti idamettha opammasaṃsandanaṃ.

[03] ^b^odhunātī^eb^ti heṭṭhā dhunāti. ^b^niddhunātī^eb^ti papphoṭeti. ^b^nicchoṭetī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0332^ea^ papphoṭetvā chaḍḍeti. idhāpi pabbajāni viya kilesā, lāyanaṃ nicchoṭanaṃ viya aniccasaññāñāṇanti iminā atthena upamā saṃsandetabbā.

[03] ^b^vaṇṭacchinnāyā^eb^ti tiṇhena khurappena vaṇṭacchinnāya. ^b^tadanvayāni bhavantī^eb^ti taṃ ambapiṇḍiṃ anugacchanti, tassā patamānāya ambāni bhūmiyaṃ patanti. idhāpi ambapiṇḍi viya kilesā, tiṇhakhurappo viya aniccasaññā, yathā khurappena chinnāya ambapiṇḍiyā sabbāni ambāni bhūmiyaṃ patanti, evaṃ aniccasaññāñāṇena kilesānaṃ mūlabhūtāya avijjāya chinnāya sabbakilesā samugghātaṃ gacchantīti, idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ.

[03] ^b^kūṭaṅgamā^eb^ti kūṭaṃ gacchanti. ^b^kūṭaninnā^eb^ti kūṭaṃ pavisanabhāvena kūṭe ninnā. ^b^kūṭasamosaraṇā^eb^ti kūṭe samosaritvā ṭhitā. idhāpi kūṭaṃ viya aniccasaññā, gopānasiyo viya ^a^V2.0292^ea^ catubhūmakakusaladhammā, yathā sabbagopānasīnaṃ ^a^M2.0304^ea^ kūṭaṃ aggaṃ, evaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ aniccasaññā aggā. nanu ca aniccasaññā lokiyā, sā lokiyakusalānaṃ tāva aggaṃ hotu, lokuttarānaṃ kathaṃ agganti? tesampi paṭilābhakaraṇatthena agganti veditabbā. iminā upāyena sabbāsu upamāsu opammasaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ. purimāhi panettha tīhi aniccasaññāya kiccaṃ, pacchimāhi balanti. dasamaṃ.
[06] pupphavaggo dasamo.
[06] majjhimapaṇṇāsako samatto.
[03] 103^b^.^eb^ antavaggassa paṭhame ^b^antā^eb^ti koṭṭhāsā. idaṃ suttaṃ catusaccavasena pañcakkhandhe yojetvā ^b^anto^eb^ti vacanena bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 104-105^b^.^eb^ dutiyampi pañcakkhandhe catusaccavasena yojetvā ^b^dukkha^eb^nti bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena kathitaṃ. tatiyampi ^a^P2.0333^ea^ tatheva ^b^sakkāyo^eb^ti bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena kathitaṃ. dutiyatatiyāni.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^pariññeyye^eb^ti parijānitabbe samatikkamitabbe. ^b^pariñña^eb^nti samatikkamaṃ. ^b^pariññātāvi^eb^nti tāya pariññāya parijānitvā samatikkamitvā ṭhitaṃ. ^b^rāgakkhayo^eb^tiādīhi nibbānaṃ dassitaṃ. catutthaṃ.
[03] 107-112^b^.^eb^ pañcamādīsu ^a^V2.0293^ea^ catūsu cattāri saccāni kathitāni. navamadasamesu kilesappahānanti. pañcamādīni.
[06] antavaggo ekādasamo.

[03] 113-114^b^.^eb^ dhammakathikavaggassa paṭhame ^a^M2.0305^ea^ ^b^ettāvatā ca avijjāgato hotī^eb^ti yāvatā imāya catūsu saccesu aññāṇabhūtāya avijjāya samannāgato, ettāvatā avijjāgato hotīti attho. dutiyepi eseva nayo. paṭhamadutiyāni.
[03] 115^b^.^eb^ tatiye paṭhamena dhammakathiko, dutiyena sekhabhūmi, tatiyena asekhabhūmīti evaṃ dhammakathikaṃ pucchitena visesetvā dve bhūmiyo kathitā. tatiyaṃ.
[03] 116^b^.^eb^ catutthe tissannampi pucchānaṃ tīṇi vissajjanāni kathitāni. catutthaṃ.

[03] 117-121^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^atīradassī^eb^ti tīraṃ vuccati vaṭṭaṃ, taṃ na passati. ^b^apāradassī^eb^ti pāraṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, taṃ na passati. ^b^baddho^eb^ti kilesabandhanena baddho hutvā jīyati ca mīyati ^a^V2.0294^ea^ ca asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gacchatīti. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭadukkhaṃ kathitanti. chaṭṭhādīni uttānatthāneva. pañcamādīni.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^P2.0334^ea^ ^b^aniccato^eb^tiādīsu hutvā abhāvākārena ^b^aniccato,^eb^ paṭipīḷanākārena ^b^dukkhato,^eb^ ābādhaṭṭhena ^b^rogato,^eb^ antodosaṭṭhena ^b^gaṇḍato,^eb^ tesaṃ tesaṃ gaṇḍānaṃ paccayabhāvena vā khaṇanaṭṭhena vā ^b^sallato^eb^ dukkhaṭṭhena ^b^aghato,^eb^ visabhāgamahābhūtasamuṭṭhānāabādhapaccayaṭṭhena ^b^ābādhato,^eb^ asakaṭṭhena ^b^parato,^eb^ palujjanaṭṭhena ^b^palokato^eb^ ^a^M2.0306^ea^, sattasuññataṭṭhena ^b^suññato,^eb^ attābhāvena ^b^anattato^eb^. evamettha ``aniccato palokato''ti dvīhi padehi aniccamanasikāro, ``suññato anattato''ti dvīhi anattamanasikāro, sesehi dukkhamanasikāro vuttoti veditabbo. sesamettha uttānameva. dasamaṃ.
[03] 123^b^.^eb^ tathā ekādasame. dasamasmiñhi ``sīlavatā''ti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ vuttaṃ, idha ^b^sutavatā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānasutaṃ idameva nānākaraṇaṃ. ekādasamaṃ.
[03] 124-125^b^.^eb^ dvādasamaterasamāni rāhulovādasadisānevāti. dvādasamaterasamāni.
[06] dhammakathikavaggo dvādasamo.
[03] 126-135^b^.^eb^ avijjāvaggo ^a^V2.0295^ea^ uttānatthova. imasmiñhi vagge sabbasuttesu catusaccameva kathitaṃ.
[06] avijjāvaggo terasamo.

[03] 136-149^b^.^eb^ kukkuḷavaggassa paṭhame ^b^kukkuḷa^eb^nti santattaṃ ādittaṃ chārikarāsiṃ viya mahāpariḷāhaṃ. imasmiṃ sutte dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ, sesesu aniccalakkhaṇādīni. sabbāni cetāni pāṭiyekkaṃ puggalajjhāsayena kathitānīti.
[06] kukkuḷavaggo cuddasamo.

[03] 150-158^b^.^eb^ diṭṭhivaggassa ^a^M2.0307^ea^ ^a^P2.0335^ea^ paṭhame ^b^kiṃ upādāyā^eb^ti kiṃ paṭicca. dutiye ^b^kiṃ abhinivissā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0296^ea^ kiṃ abhinivisitvā, paccayaṃ katvāti attho. tatiyādīsu ^b^diṭṭhī^eb^tiādīni puggalajjhāsayena vuttāni. paṭhamādīni.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti aññe bhikkhū pañcakkhandhakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā yuñjitvā ghaṭetvā arahattaṃ patvā satthu santike aññaṃ byākaronte disvā ``ahampi pañcakkhandhakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā yuñjanto ghaṭento, arahattaṃ patvā aññaṃ byākarissāmī''ti cintetvā upasaṅkami. satthā pana attano dharamānakāle therassa uparimaggattayavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ apassantopi ``imassa cittaṃ gaṇhissāmī''ti kathesi. tassāpi ekaṃ dve vāre manasi katvāva buddhupaṭṭhānavelā jātāti gantabbaṃ hoti. itissa cittaṃ sampahaṃsamāno vimuttiparipācanīyadhammova so kammaṭṭhānānuyogo jātoti. dasamaṃ.
[06] diṭṭhivaggo pannarasamo.
[06] uparipaṇṇāsako samatto.
[06] khandhasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ rādhasaṃyuttassa ^a^V2.0297^ea^ ^a^M2.0308^ea^ paṭhame ^b^māro vā assā^eb^ti maraṇaṃ vā bhaveyya. ^b^māretā vā^eb^ti māretabbo vā. ^b^yo vā pana mīyatī^eb^ti yo vā pana marati. ^b^nibbidattha^eb^nti nibbidāñāṇatthaṃ. ^b^nibbānatthā^eb^ti phalavimutti nāmesā anupādānibbānatthāti attho. ^b^accayāsī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0336^ea^ atikkantosi. ^b^nibbānogadha^eb^nti nibbāne patiṭṭhitaṃ. idaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ nāma nibbānabbhantare vussati, na nibbānaṃ atikkamitvāti attho. ^b^nibbānapariyosāna^eb^nti nibbānaṃ assa pariyosānaṃ, nipphatti niṭṭhāti attho. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] 161-169^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^satto satto^eb^ti laggapucchā. ^b^tatra satto tatra visatto^eb^ti tatra laggo tatra vilaggo. ^b^paṃsvāgārakehī^eb^ti paṃsugharakehi. ^b^keḷāyantī^eb^ti kīḷanti. ^b^dhanāyantī^eb^ti dhanaṃ viya maññanti. ^b^mamāyantī^eb^ti ``mama idaṃ, mama ida''nti mamattaṃ karonti, aññassa phusitumpi na denti. ^b^vikīḷaniyaṃ karontī^eb^ti ``niṭṭhitā kīḷā''ti te bhindamānā kīḷāvigamaṃ karonti. tatiye ^b^bhavanettī^eb^ti bhavarajju. catutthaṃ uttānameva. pañcamādīsu catūsu cattāri saccāni kathitāni, dvīsu kilesappahānanti. dutiyādīni.
[06] paṭhamo vaggo.

[03] 170-181^b^.^eb^ dutiyavaggassa ^a^V2.0298^ea^ paṭhame ^b^māro, māro^eb^ti maraṇaṃ pucchati. yasmā pana rūpādivinimuttaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma natthi, tenassa bhagavā ^b^rūpaṃ kho, rādha, māro^eb^tiādimāha ^a^M2.0309^ea^. dutiye ^b^māradhammo^eb^ti maraṇadhammo. etenupāyena sabbattha attho veditabboti.
[06] dutiyo vaggo.

[03] 182-205^b^.^eb^ tato ^a^P2.0337^ea^ paraṃ uttānatthameva. ayañhi rādhatthero paṭibhāniyatthero nāma. tathāgatassa imaṃ theraṃ disvā sukhumaṃ kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti. tenassa bhagavā nānānayehi dhammaṃ deseti. evaṃ imasmiṃ rādhasaṃyutte ādito dve vaggā pucchāvasena desitā, tatiyo āyācanena, catuttho upanisinnakakathāvasena. sakalampi panetaṃ rādhasaṃyuttaṃ therassa vimuttiparipācanīyadhammavaseneva gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
[06] rādhasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ diṭṭhisaṃyutte ^a^V2.0299^ea^ ^a^M2.0310^ea^ ^b^na vātā vāyantī^eb^tiādīsu evaṃ kira tesaṃ diṭṭhi -- ``yepi ete rukkhasākhādīni bhañjantā vātā vāyanti, na ete vātā, vātaleso nāmeso, vāto pana esikatthambho viya pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhito. tathā yāpi etā tiṇakaṭṭhādīni vahantiyo nadiyo sandanti, na ettha udakaṃ sandaki, udakaleso nāmesa, udakaṃ pana esikatthambho viya pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhitaṃ. yāpimā gabbhiniyo vijāyantīti ca vuccanti, kiñcāpi tā milātudarā honti, gabbho pana na nikkhamati, gabbhaleso nāmeso, gabbho pana esikatthambho viya pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhito. yepi ete candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā, neva te udenti na apenti, candimasūriyaleso nāmesa, candimasūriyā pana esikatthambho viya pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ca ṭhitā''ti.

[03] 207-209^b^.^eb^ ^b^diṭṭha^eb^ntiādīsu ^b^diṭṭhaṃ^eb^ rūpāyatanaṃ. ^b^sutaṃ^eb^ saddāyatanaṃ. ^b^mutaṃ^eb^ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ. tañhi patvā gahetabbato mutanti ca vuttaṃ. avasesāni sattāyatanāni ^b^viññātaṃ^eb^ nāma. ^b^patta^eb^nti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ. ^b^pariyesita^eb^nti pattaṃ vā apattaṃ ^a^P2.0338^ea^ vā pariyesitaṃ. ^b^anuvicaritaṃ manasā^eb^ti cittena anusañcaritaṃ. lokasmiñhi pariyesitvā pattampi atthi, pariyesitvā nopattampi, apariyesitvā pattampi, apariyesitvā nopattampi. tattha pariyesitvā pattaṃ pattaṃ nāma, pariyesitvā nopattaṃ pariyesitaṃ nāma ^a^V2.0300^ea^. apariyesitvā pattañca apariyesitvā nopattañca manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma. atha vā pariyesitvā pattampi apariyesitvā pattampi pattaṭṭhena pattaṃ nāma, pariyesitvā nopattameva pariyesitaṃ nāma, apariyesitvā nopattaṃ manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma. sabbaṃ vā etaṃ manasā anuvicaritameva.

[03] 210^b^.^eb^ ^b^natthi^eb^ ^a^M2.0311^ea^ ^b^dinna^eb^ntiādīsu ^b^natthi dinna^eb^nti dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadanti. ^b^yiṭṭhaṃ^eb^ vuccati mahāyāgo. ^b^huta^eb^nti paheṇakasakkāro adhippeto. tampi ubhayaṃ phalābhāvameva sandhāya paṭikkhipanti. ^b^sukatadukkaṭāna^eb^nti sukatadukkatānaṃ, kusalākusalānanti attho. ^b^phalaṃ vipāko^eb^ti yaṃ phalanti vā vipākoti vā vuccati, taṃ natthīti vadanti. ^b^natthi ayaṃ loko^eb^ti paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthi. ^b^natthi paro loko^eb^ti idha loke ṭhitassapi paro loko natthi, sabbe tattha tattheva ucchijjantīti dassenti. ^b^natthi mātā natthi pitā^eb^ti tesu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalābhāvavasena vadanti. ^b^natthi sattā opapātikā^eb^ti cavitvā uppajjanakasattā nāma natthīti vadanti. ^b^natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā^eb^ti loke sammāpaṭipannā samaṇabrāhmaṇā nāma natthīti vadanti.

[03] ^b^cātumahābhūtiko^eb^ti catumahābhūtamayo. ^b^pathavī pathavīkāya^eb^nti ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu bāhiraṃ pathavīdhātuṃ. ^b^anupetī^eb^ti anuyāti. ^b^anupagacchatī^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ, anugacchatītipi attho. ubhayenāpi upeti upagacchatīti dassenti. ^b^āpā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^indriyānī^eb^ti manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni. ^b^saṅkamantī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0339^ea^ ākāsaṃ pakkhandanti. ^b^āsandipañcamā^eb^ti nipannamañcena pañcamā, mañco ceva, cattāro mañcapāde gahetvā ṭhitā cattāro purisā cāti attho. ^b^yāva āḷāhanā^eb^ti yāva susānā. ^b^padānī^eb^ti ``ayaṃ evaṃ sīlavā ahosi, evaṃ dussīlo''tiādinā nayena pavattāni guṇāguṇapadāni. sarīrameva vā ettha padānīti adhippetaṃ. ^b^kāpotakānī^eb^ti kapotakavaṇṇāni, pārāvatapakkhavaṇṇānīti attho. ^b^bhassantā^eb^ti bhasmantā. ayameva vā pāḷi. ^b^āhutiyo^eb^ti yaṃ paheṇakasakkārādibhedaṃ dinnadānaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ chārikāvasānameva hoti, na tato paraṃ phaladāyakaṃ hutvā gacchatīti attho. ^b^dattupaññatta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0301^ea^ dattūhi bālamanussehi paññattaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- bālehi abuddhīhi paññattamidaṃ dānaṃ, na paṇḍitehi. bālā denti, paṇḍitā gaṇhantīti dassenti.

[03] 211^b^.^eb^ ^b^karoto^eb^ti ^a^M2.0312^ea^ sahatthā karontassa. ^b^kārayato^eb^ti āṇattiyā kārentassa. ^b^chindato^eb^ti paresaṃ hatthādīni chindantassa. ^b^chedāpayato^eb^ti parehi chedāpentassa. ^b^pacato^eb^ti daṇḍena pīḷentassa. ^b^pacāpayato^eb^ti parehi daṇḍādinā pīḷāpentassa. ^b^socato socāpayato^eb^ti parassa bhaṇḍaharaṇādīhi sokaṃ sayaṃ karontassāpi parehi kārentassāpi. ^b^kilamato kilamāpayato^eb^ti āhārupacchedabandhanāgārapavesanādīhi sayaṃ kilamentassapi parehi kilamāpentassapi. ^b^phandato phandāpayato^eb^ti paraṃ phandantaṃ phandanakāle sayampi phandato parempi phandāpayato. ^b^pāṇamatipātayato^eb^ti ^a^P2.0340^ea^ pāṇaṃ hanantassapi hanāpentassapi. evaṃ sabbattha karaṇakārāpanavaseneva attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^sandhi^eb^nti gharasandhiṃ. ^b^nillopa^eb^nti mahāvilopaṃ. ^b^ekāgārika^eb^nti ekameva gharaṃ parivāretvā vilumpanaṃ. ^b^paripanthe tiṭṭhato^eb^ti āgatāgatānaṃ acchindanatthaṃ magge tiṭṭhato. ^b^karoto na karīyati pāpa^eb^nti yaṃkiñci pāpaṃ karomīti saññāya karotopi pāpaṃ na karīyati, natthi pāpaṃ. sattā pana karomāti evaṃsaññino hontīti dīpenti. ^b^khurapariyantenā^eb^ti khuraneminā, khuradhārasadisapariyantena vā. ^b^ekamaṃsakhala^eb^nti ekamaṃsarāsiṃ. ^b^puñja^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^tatonidāna^eb^nti ekamaṃsakhalakaraṇanidānaṃ.

[03] ^b^dakkhiṇa^eb^nti dakkhiṇatīre manussā kakkhaḷā dāruṇā, te sandhāya ^b^hananto^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^uttara^eb^nti uttaratīre saddhā honti pasannā buddhamāmakā dhammamāmakā saṅghamāmakā, te sandhāya ^b^dadanto^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^yajanto^eb^ti mahāyāgaṃ karonto. ^b^damenā^eb^ti indriyadamena uposathakammena. ^b^saṃyamenā^eb^ti sīlasaṃyamena. ^b^saccavajjenā^eb^ti saccavacanena. ^b^āgamo^eb^ti āgamanaṃ, pavattīti attho. sabbathāpi pāpapuññānaṃ kiriyameva paṭikkhipanti.

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ ^b^natthi^eb^ ^a^V2.0302^ea^ ^a^M2.0313^ea^ ^b^hetu natthi paccayo^eb^ti ettha ^b^paccayo^eb^ti hetuvevacanameva. ubhayenāpi vijjamānameva kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃkilesapaccayaṃ, kāyasucaritādīnañca visuddhipaccayaṃ paṭikkhipanti. ^b^natthi bala^eb^nti yamhi attano bale patiṭṭhitā ime sattā devattampi mārattampi brahmattampi sāvakabodhimpi paccekabodhimpi sabbaññutampi pāpuṇanti, taṃ balaṃ paṭikkhipanti. ^b^natthi vīriya^eb^ntiādīni sabbāni aññamaññavevacanāneva. ``idaṃ no vīriyena, idaṃ purisathāmena, idaṃ purisaparakkamena ^a^P2.0341^ea^ patta''nti, evaṃ pavattavacanapaṭikkhepakaraṇavasena panetāni visuṃ ādiyanti.

[03] ^b^sabbe sattā^eb^ti oṭṭhagoṇagadrabhādayo anavasese pariggaṇhanti. ^b^sabbe pāṇā^eb^ti ekindriyo pāṇo, dvindriyo pāṇotiādivasena vadanti. ^b^sabbe bhūtā^eb^ti aṇḍakosavatthikosesu bhūte sandhāya vadanti. ^b^sabbe jīvā^eb^ti sāliyavagodhumādayo sandhāya vadanti. tesu hi te viruhanabhāvena jīvasaññino. ^b^avasā abalā avīriyā^eb^ti tesaṃ attano vaso vā balaṃ vā vīriyaṃ vā natthi. ^b^niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatā^eb^ti ettha ^b^niyatī^eb^ti niyatatā. ^b^saṅgatī^eb^ti channaṃ abhijātīnaṃ tattha tattha gamanaṃ. ^b^bhāvo^eb^ti sabhāvoyeva. evaṃ niyatiyā ca saṅgatiyā ca bhāvena ca pariṇatā nānappakārataṃ pattā. yena hi yathā bhavitabbaṃ, so tatheva bhavati. yena na bhavitabbaṃ, so na bhavatīti dassenti. ^b^chasvevābhijātīsū^eb^ti chasu eva abhijātīsu ṭhatvā sukhañca dukkhañca paṭisaṃvedenti, aññā sukhadukkhabhūmi natthīti dassenti.

[03] 213-215^b^.^eb^ ^b^akaṭā^eb^ti akatā. ^b^akaṭavidhā^eb^ti akatavidhānā, ``evaṃ karohī''ti kenaci kāritāpi na hontīti attho. ^b^animmitā^eb^ti iddhiyāpi na nimmitā. ^b^animmātā^eb^ti animmāpitā. ``animmitabbā''tipi pāṭho, na nimmitabbāti attho. ^b^vañjhā^eb^ti vañjhapasuvañjhatālādayo viya aphalā kassaci ajanakā. pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ṭhitāti ^b^kūṭaṭṭhā^eb^. esikaṭṭhāyino viya hutvā ṭhitāti ^b^esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā,^eb^ yathā sunikhāto esikatthambho niccalo tiṭṭhati, evaṃ ṭhitāti attho. ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P2.0342^ea^ ^b^iñjantī^eb^ti esikatthambho viya ṭhitattā ^a^M2.0314^ea^ na calanti. ^b^na vipariṇamantī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0303^ea^ pakatiṃ na vijahanti. ^b^na aññamaññaṃ byābādhentī^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ na upahananti. ^b^nāla^eb^nti na samatthā. ^b^pathavīkāyo^eb^tiādīsu pathavīyeva pathavīkāyo, pathavīsamūho vā. ^b^sattannaṃtveva kāyāna^eb^nti yathā muggarāsiādīsu pahaṭaṃ satthaṃ muggarāsiādīnaṃ antareneva pavisati, evaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ antarena chiddena vivarena satthaṃ pavisati. tattha ``ahaṃ imaṃ jīvitā voropemī''ti kevalaṃ saññāmattameva hotīti dassenti.

[03] ^b^yonipamukhasatasahassānī^eb^ti pamukhayonīnaṃ uttamayonīnaṃ cuddasasatasahassāni aññāni ca saṭṭhisatāni aññāni ca chasatāni ^b^pañca ca kammuno satānī^eb^ti pañcakammasatāni cāti kevalaṃ takkamattakena niratthakadiṭṭhiṃ dīpenti. ^b^pañca ca kammāni tīṇi ca kammānī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. keci panāhu ``pañca kammānīti pañcindriyavasena gaṇhanti, tīṇīti kāyakammādivasenā''ti. ^b^kamme ca aḍḍhakamme cā^eb^ti ettha panassa kāyakammavacīkammāni kammanti laddhi, manokammaṃ upaḍḍhakammanti. ^b^dvaṭṭhipaṭipadā^eb^ti dvāsaṭṭhipaṭipadāti vadanti. ^b^dvaṭṭhantarakappā^eb^ti ekasmiṃ kappe catusaṭṭhi antarakappā nāma honti, ayaṃ pana aññe dve ajānanto evamāha.

[03] ^b^chaḷābhijātiyo^eb^ti kaṇhābhijāti nīlābhijāti lohitābhijāti haliddābhijāti sukkābhijāti paramasukkābhijātīti imā cha abhijātiyo vadanti. tattha orabbhikā sūkarikā sākuṇikā māgavikā luddā macchaghātakā corā coraghātakā bandhanāgārikā, ye vā panaññepi keci kurūrakammantā, ayaṃ kaṇhābhijātīti vadanti. bhikkhū nīlābhijātīti vadanti. te kira catūsu paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādanti, ``bhikkhū ^a^P2.0343^ea^ ca kaṇṭakavuttikā''ti (a0 ni0 6.57) ayaṃ hissa pāḷi eva. atha vā kaṇṭakavuttikā eva nāma eke pabbajitāti vadanti. lohitābhijāti nāma nigaṇṭhā ekasāṭakāti vadanti. ime kira purimehi dvīhi paṇḍaratarā. gihī odātavasanā acelakasāvakā haliddābhijātīti vadanti. evaṃ attano paccayadāyake nigaṇṭhehipi jeṭṭhakatare karonti. ājīvakā ājīviniyo ayaṃ sukkābhijātīti vadanti. te kira purimehi catūhi paṇḍaratarā ^a^M2.0315^ea^. nando vaccho, kiso saṃkicco, makkhali gosālo paramasukkābhijātīti vadanti. te kira sabbehi paṇḍaratarā.

[03] ^b^aṭṭha^eb^ ^a^V2.0304^ea^ ^b^purisabhūmiyo^eb^ti mandabhūmi khiḍḍābhūmi vīmaṃsakabhūmi ujugatabhūmi sekhabhūmi samaṇabhūmi jānanabhūmi pannabhūmīti imā aṭṭha purisabhūmiyoti vadanti. tattha jātadivasato paṭṭhāya satta divase sambādhaṭṭhānato nikkhantattā sattā mandā honti momūhā, ayaṃ mandabhūmīti vadanti. ye pana duggatito āgatā honti, te abhiṇhaṃ rodanti ceva viravanti ca, sugatito āgatā taṃ anussaritvā anussaritvā hasanti, ayaṃ khiḍḍābhūmi nāma. mātāpitūnaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ padanikkhipanaṃ vīmaṃsakabhūmi nāma. padasā gantuṃ samatthakālo ujugatabhūmi nāma. sippāni sikkhanakālo sekhabhūmi nāma. gharā nikkhamma pabbajanakālo samaṇabhūmi nāma. ācariyaṃ sevitvā jānanakālo jānanabhūmi nāma. ``bhikkhu ca pannako jino na kiñci āhā''ti evaṃ alābhiṃ samaṇaṃ pannabhūmīti vadanti.

[03] ^b^ekūnapaññāsa^eb^ ^a^P2.0344^ea^ ^b^ājīvakasate^eb^ti ekūnapaññāsa ājīvavuttisatāni. ^b^paribbājakasate^eb^ti paribbājakapabbajjāsatāni. ^b^nāgavāsasate^eb^ti nāgamaṇḍalasatāni. ^b^vīse indriyasate^eb^ti vīsa indriyasatāni. ^b^tiṃse nirayasate^eb^ti tiṃsa nirayasatāni. ^b^rajodhātuyo^eb^ti rajaokiraṇaṭṭhānāni. hatthapiṭṭhipādapiṭṭhādīni sandhāya vadati. ^b^satta saññīgabbhā^eb^ti oṭṭhagoṇagadrabhājapasumigamahiṃse sandhāya vadati. ^b^satta asaññīgabbhā^eb^ti sāliyavagodhumamuggakaṅguvarakakudrūsake sandhāya vadati. ^b^nigaṇṭhigabbhā^eb^ti gaṇṭhimhi jātagabbhā, ucchuveḷunaḷādayo sandhāya vadati. ^b^satta devā^eb^ti bahū devā, so pana sattāti vadati. manussāpi anantā, so sattāti vadati. ^b^satta pesācā^eb^ti pisācā mahantamahantā, sattāti vadati. ^b^sarā^eb^ti mahāsarā. kaṇṇamuṇḍa-rathakāra-anotatta-sīhappapāta-chaddanta-mucalinda-kuṇāladahe gahetvā vadati.

[03] ^b^pavuṭā^eb^ti gaṇṭhikā. ^b^papātā^eb^ti mahāpapātā. ^b^papātasatānī^eb^ti khuddakapapātasatāni. ^b^supinā^eb^ti mahāsupinā. ^b^supinasatānī^eb^ti khuddakasupinasatāni. ^b^mahākappino^eb^ti mahākappānaṃ. ettha ekamhā mahāsarā vassasate ^a^M2.0316^ea^ vassasate kusaggena ekaṃ udakabinduṃ nīharitvā sattakkhattuṃ tamhi sare nirudake kate eko mahākappoti vadati. evarūpānaṃ mahākappānaṃ caturāsītisatasahassāni khepetvā bāle ca paṇḍite ca dukkhassantaṃ karontīti ayamassa laddhi. paṇḍitopi kira antarāvisujjhituṃ na sakkoti, bālopi tato uddhaṃ na gacchati.

[03] ^b^sīlena^eb^ ^a^V2.0305^ea^ ^a^P2.0345^ea^ ^b^vā^eb^ti acelakasīlena vā aññena vā yena kenaci. ^b^vatenā^eb^ti tādiseneva vatena. ^b^tapenā^eb^ti tapokammena. ^b^aparipakkaṃ paripāceti^eb^ nāma yo ``ahaṃ paṇḍito''ti antarā visujjhati. ^b^paripakkaṃ phussa phussa byantīkaroti^eb^ nāma yo ``ahaṃ bālo''ti vuttaparimāṇakālaṃ atikkamitvā yāti. ^b^hevaṃ natthī^eb^ti evaṃ natthi. tañhi ubhayampi na sakkā kātunti dīpeti. ^b^doṇamite^eb^ti doṇena mitaṃ viya. ^b^sukhadukkhe^eb^ti sukhadukkhaṃ. ^b^pariyantakate^eb^ti vuttaparimāṇena kālena katapariyanto. ^b^natthi hāyanavaḍḍhane^eb^ti natthi hāyanavaḍḍhanāni, na saṃsāro paṇḍitassa hāyati, na bālassa vaḍḍhatīti attho. ^b^ukkaṃsāvakaṃse^eb^ti ukkaṃsāvakaṃsā. hāyanavaḍḍhanānamevetaṃ vevacanaṃ. idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya sādhento ^b^seyyathāpi nāmā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^suttaguḷe^eb^ti veṭhetvā katasuttaguḷe. ^b^nibbeṭhiyamānameva paletī^eb^ti pabbate vā rukkhagge vā ṭhatvā khittaṃ suttappamāṇena nibbeṭhiyamānameva gacchati, sutte khīṇe tattheva tiṭṭhati, na gacchati evameva bālā ca paṇḍitā ca kālavasena nibbeṭhiyamānā sukhadukkhaṃ palenti, yathāvuttena kālena atikkamantīti dasseti.

[03] 216-223^b^.^eb^ ^b^antavā loko^eb^ti ekato vaḍḍhitanimittaṃ lokoti gāhena vā takkena vā uppannadiṭṭhi. ^b^anantavā^eb^ti sabbato vaḍḍhitaṃ appamāṇanimittaṃ lokoti gāhena vā takkena vā uppannadiṭṭhi. ^b^taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra^eb^nti jīvañca sarīrañca ekamevāti uppannadiṭṭhi. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti. imāni tāva sotāpattimaggavasena aṭṭhārasa veyyākaraṇāni ekaṃ gamanaṃ.

[03] 224-301^b^.^eb^ dutiyaṃ ^a^M2.0317^ea^ gamanaṃ dukkhavasena vuttaṃ. tatrāpi aṭṭhāraseva veyyākaraṇāni, tato parāni ``rūpī attā hotī''tiādīni aṭṭha veyyākaraṇāni, tehi saddhiṃ taṃ dutiyapeyyāloti vutto.

[03] tattha ^a^P2.0346^ea^ ^b^rūpī^eb^ti ārammaṇameva ``attā''ti gahitadiṭṭhi. ^b^arūpī^eb^ti jhānaṃ ``attā''ti gahitadiṭṭhi ^a^V2.0306^ea^. ^b^rūpī ca arūpī cā^eb^ti ārammaṇañca jhānañca ``attā''ti gahitadiṭṭhi. ^b^neva rūpī nārūpī^eb^ti takkamattena gahitadiṭṭhi. ^b^ekantasukhī^eb^ti lābhītakkījātissarānaṃ uppannadiṭṭhi. jhānalābhinopi hi atīte ekantasukhaṃ attabhāvaṃ manasikaroto evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati. takkinopi ``yathā etarahi ahaṃ ekantasukhī, evaṃ samparāyepi bhavissāmī''ti uppajjati. jātissarassapi sattaṭṭhabhave sukhitabhāvaṃ passantassa evaṃ uppajjati, ^b^ekantadukkhī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo.
[03] tatiyapeyyālo aniccadukkhavasena tehiyeva chabbīsatiyā suttehi vutto, catutthapeyyālo tiparivaṭṭavasenāti.
[06] diṭṭhisaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
